Ajit VadakayilNovember 7, 2018 at 11:31 AM<br />\n<br />\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/us-midterms-democrats-retake-control-of-house-of-representatives-republicans-retain-senate/articleshow/66532586.cms<br />\n<br />\nThe United States Congress is the legislative branch of the federal government and consists of two houses: the lower house known as the House of Representatives and the upper house known as the Senate.<br />\n<br />\nBoth have to pass a bill in order for it to become law (which is the chief power of congress).<br />\n<br />\nThe Senate is about representing the states. The House is about representing the people directly. Senators serve for 6-year terms. Representatives serve for 2-year terms. Both houses must have 2/3rds of its members vote to override a Presidential veto.<br />\n<br />\nThere are 535 members of Congress: 100 senators and 435 representatives in the House. In general, the House represents the population, while the Senate represents a \"landed/large property\" populace.<br />\n<br />\nThe major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its bills must also be passed by the Senate and further agreed to by the United States President before becoming law (unless both the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber).<br />\n<br />\nEach U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to its population but is entitled to at least one representative. The most populous state, California, currently has 53 representatives.<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution empowers the House of Representatives to impeach federal officials for treason, bribery, or other high crimes and misdemeanors and empowers the Senate to try such impeachment.<br />\n<br />\nEvery state is represented by two Senators, but by different numbers of Representatives based on their population. The Senate gives small states equal representation, because the Senate is about representing the states. The House is about representing the people directly. Senators serve for 6-year terms.<br />\nThe major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its bills must also be passed by the Senate and further agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law.<br />\n<br />\nThe House plays a major role in government, mainly that of initiating all revenue-based legislation. Any proposal to raise taxes must come from the House, with Senate review and approval. The Senate, on the other hand, has sole power of approval on foreign treaties and cabinet and judicial nominations, including appointments to the Supreme Court.<br />\n<br />\nSenate has the sole power to conduct impeachment trials<br />\n<br />\nThe Senate is composed of two senators from each state who are granted exclusive powers to confirm appointments and place holds on laws. It has the power to consent to treaties as a precondition to their ratification and consenting or confirming appointments of Cabinet secretaries, federal judges, other federal executive officials, military officers, regulatory officials, ambassadors, and other federal uniformed officers.<br />\n<br />\nSenators serve terms of six years each; the terms are staggered so that approximately one-third of the seats are up for election every two years. The Senate has several exclusive powers not granted to the House.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_19TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_18B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5739634969576167937\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_18M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. All are equal. These celebrations have been going on for 6000 years . It is stress busting time.<br />\n<br />\nThe government does NOT arrest people who had Marijuana or Cannabis ( Bhang ) as long as they are not disruptive. Enemies have heart to heart talks and make up on this day.<br />\n<br />\nThe atmosphere is electric with fun and joy. THIS BOARD HAS BEEN IN THE CONTROL OF ANTI-HINDU FORCES FROM ABROAD FOR A LONG TIME..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DEVASWOM BOARD ARE ENEMIES OF SANATANA DHARMA AND HINDU DEVOTEES.. THE BENAMI MEDIA, THE COLLEGIUM JUDICARY AND CONTINIOUS ROTATION OF CHRISTIAN/ MUSLIM/ COMMIE GOVTS IN KERALA SUPPORT THE ANTI-HINDU FOREIGN FORCES..<br />\n<br />\nTHE LAST DEVASWOM BOARD PRESIDENT TOLD THE PEOPLE ON JANAM TV THAT HE HANDED OVER 1200 CRORES TO HIS RELEIVER, BUT STILL SABARIMALA PILGRIMS ARE BEING DENIED OF THEIR FUNDNAMENTAL RIGHTS OF DRINKING WATER , TOILET FACILITIES AND RIGHT TO WORSHIP.<br />\n<br />\nTHE DEVASWOM BOARD IS PACKED WITH ATHEIST COMMIES AND CHRISTIANS WITH HINDU NAMES.. ALL THEY ARE BOTHERED IS ABOUT THEMSELVES, THEIR SALARIES, THEIR BONUSES ,AND THEIR PERKS..<br />\n<br />\nTheir aim of Devaswom board is to manage Hindu temples and their assets and to ensure their smooth operation in accordance with traditional rituals and customs \u2013but in reality this board does just the opposite..<br />\n<br />\nThe five Kerala devaswoms (Guruvayur, Travancore, Malabar, Cochin, and Koodalmanikyam) together manage nearly 3045 temples.<br />\n<br />\nPeople of other religions and atheist commies have no right to run Hindu temples and pilgrimages. The Kerala government, in order to project themselves as the flag bearer of secularism, is playing with the religious sentiments of the Hindus with benami media and collegium judiciary in cahoots.<br />\n<br />\nThis is part of a concerted effort of the state to take over Hindu temples.. Travancore Devaswom Board chief A Padma Kumar is also a CPM leader.<br />\n<br />\nNow the main aim of the Devaswom board if to make the Hindu self loathing and also grab the enormous PRISTINE gold in the vaults of Padmanabhaswamy temple.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html<br />\n<br />\nA PRIME EXAMPLE OF ANTI-HINDU , ANTI-WATAN DEVASWOM BOARD CONSPIRACY IS AFFAIRS OF THE KODUNGALLUR TEMPLE BELOW\u2014<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/kodungallur-bharani-festival-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nIN THE CURRENT SABRIMALA MENSTRUATING AGE WOMENs ISSUE THE DROHI DEVASWOM BOARD IS HELL BENT OF PUSHING WOMEN OF THE MENSTRUATING AGE INTO SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE THOUGH THEY KNOW THAT 99.9% ( A REFERENDUM CAN PROVE THIS ) OF HINDU WOMEN WANT TO WAIT TILL THE AGE OF 50..<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/judiciary-in-contempt-of-we-people-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE KNOW THE DEEP STATE PAYROLL ANTI-HINDU JUDGES IN OUR SYSTEM..<br />\n<br />\nFIVE JUDGES OF AN ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY WHICH IS NOT ALLOWED BY THE CONSTITUTION WANT TO DECIDE THE FATE OF 1300 MILLION INDIANS?..<br />\nSORRY, WE THE PEOPLE WONT ALLOW THAT..<br />\n<br />\nThey anti-Hindu Devaswom board controls the religious rituals carried out in temples, decide who will be appointed as the chief Pujari of the temple, manage their finances and even tax the income of Hindu temples.<br />\n<br />\nOnly Hindu temples are subjected to interventions, places of worship of other religion such as churches and mosques are free from any government intervention.<br />\n<br />\nCOMMUNISTS GRABBED MOST OF THE TEMPLE LANDS AND DISTRIBUTED IT AMONG LANDLESS COMMIE CADRE AND CHRISTIAN CONVERTS.. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/open-letter-to-romila-thapar-from-capt.html?showComment=1541854404047#c2672388927885150572\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 10, 2018 at 6:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_18MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.asianage.com/india/all-india/061118/govt-rbi-row-may-delay-bill-urjit-to-skip-ls-panel-hearing.html<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: owing to URJIT Patel\u2019s absence, the scheduled sitting of the parliamentary standing committee on finance next week has been postponed. This could delay the committee\u2019s finalising its report on the Banning of Unregulated Deposit Schemes Bill 2018. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/amway-merchants-of-pipe-dreams-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN A PYRAMIDS SCHEME ONLY THE APEX OF THE PYRAMID MAKES MONEY..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TOP IS USUALLY A JEW..<br />\n<br />\nTHE LAYER BELOW HIM ARE HIS BENAMI AGENTS.<br />\n<br />\nTHE JEW MAKES ALL THE MOOLAH SITTING ON HIS KOSHER ASS.<br />\n<br />\nAs its name indicates, the pyramid scheme is structured like a pyramid.<br />\n<br />\nIt starts with one JEW ( OR HIS BENAMIFRONT ) - the initial recruiter - who is on top, at the apex of the pyramid. This person recruits a second person, who is required to \"invest\" for instance Rs 10,000 which is paid to the initial recruiter.<br />\n<br />\nIn order to make his or her money back, the new recruit must recruit more people under him or her, each of whom will also have to invest Rs 10,000. If the recruit gets 10 more people to invest, this person will make Rs 90,000 with just a Rs 10,000 investment.<br />\n<br />\nThe 10 new people become recruiters and each one is in turn required to enlist an additional 10 people, resulting in a total of 100 more people. Each of those 100 new recruits is also obligated to pay Rs 10,000 to the person who recruited him or her; recruiters get a profit of all of the money received minus the initial Rs 10,000 paid to the person who recruited them.<br />\n<br />\nThe process continues until the base of the pyramid is no longer strong enough to support the upper structure (meaning there are no more fools to recruit)<br />\n<br />\nPeople are deceived into believing that by giving money they will make more money (\"with an investment of just Rs 10,000, you will receive Rs 90,000 in return\"). But no wealth has been created; no product has been sold; no investment has been made; and no service has been provided.<br />\n<br />\nIt becomes easy when the Pyramid Schemers pay the first batch of people, this is because they now have vocal ambassadors and witnesses who have been paid and hence can convince people that scheme is a legitimate one. The fraud lies in the fact that it is impossible for the cycle to sustain itself, so people will lose their money somewhere down the line.<br />\n<br />\nThose who are most vulnerable are those towards the bottom of the pyramid, where it becomes impossible to recruit the number of people required to pay off the previous layer of recruiters.<br />\n<br />\nIt is estimated that 94 % of people who get involved in a pyramid scheme will lose their money.<br />\n<br />\nBecause people are attracted to the idea of making a quick buck with very little effort, many different forms of disguised pyramid schemes have succeeded in fooling people. Despite the illusion of legality presented by these revamped schemes, they are still illegal.<br />\n<br />\nLegal multi-level marketing (MLM) , involves being recruited in order to sell a product or service that actually has some inherent value. As a recruit, you can make a profit from the sales of the product or service, so you don't necessarily have to recruit more salespeople below you.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_18BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_18b+seedDx7aD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_17TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_17TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_17TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_18b+seedDx7aD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_17TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; It is not necessarily a pyramid, which is hierarchical.<br />\n<br />\nIn a Ponzi scheme, there is one person who takes people's money as an \"investment\" and does not necessarily tell them how their returns will be generated.<br />\n<br />\nAs such, the people's return on investment could be generated by anything; it could come from money taken from new investors - which means new investors essentially pay off the old investors<br />\n<br />\nThey usually tell ignorant Kenyans that they invest in teak trees on banks of the river Nile , offshore trade and have business in tax free Havens. . This is the most difficult type to identify; this is because they hire smart marketers and know how to network with opinion leaders in any society so as to earn the confidence of the locals.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_18b+seedDx7aD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_18b+seedDx7aD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_37TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_36B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8812851847905357018\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_36M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7641996351644862987\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_23M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/open-letter-to-romila-thapar-from-capt.html?showComment=1541858023484#c7641996351644862987\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 10, 2018 at 7:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_23MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nThe Church of England (C of E) is the Established Church of England . The Archbishop of Canterbury is the most senior cleric<br />\n<br />\nThe English church renounced papal authority when Henry VIII failed to secure an annulment of his marriage to Catherine of Aragon in 1534<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html<br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/12/exhumed-truths-of-spanish-armada-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nOn 12 March 1994, the first 32 women were ordained as Church of England priests. Since then the Church of England has been sponsoring lesbianism . This is merely to increase the number of Church goers. The Church of England has allowed priests to enter into same-sex civil partnerships since 2005. The Church of Ireland recognises the pensions for clergy in same-sex civil partnerships.<br />\n<br />\nOther major Christian denominations are going through similar struggles, and ultimately we may be seeing the largest shift in Protestant thinking since the days of the Reformation.<br />\n<br />\nThe church attendance is abysmal<br />\n<br />\nThe first woman to be ordained as a bishop in the Church of England was Libby Lane. She is married.<br />\n<br />\nAnglican national churches in Brazil, South Africa, South India, New Zealand and Canada have taken steps toward approving and celebrating same-sex relationships<br />\n<br />\nThe push for striking down sec 377 in India ( homosexuality ) came from the Church of England.<br />\n<br />\nChurch of England clergy gave the green signal for gay marriage after they rejected a bishops\u2019 report which said that only a man and woman could marry in church..<br />\n<br />\nThe Church of England's General Synod has discussed a diocesan motion \"to create a set of formal services and prayers to bless those who have had a same-sex marriage or civil partnership.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2002, the Diocese of New Westminster, in the Anglican Church of Canada, permitted the blessing of same-sex unions. In 2003, two openly gay men in England and the United States became candidates for bishop.<br />\n<br />\nIn the Episcopal Church in the United States, Gene Robinson was elected and consecrated Bishop of New Hampshire, becoming the first openly gay bishop in the Anglican Communion and in apostolic Christianity.<br />\n<br />\nThis was highly controversial and led several hundred bishops to boycott the 2008 Lambeth Conference. As an alternative to Lambeth, many of these bishops attended the Global Anglican Futures Conference in Jerusalem.<br />\n<br />\nIt just proves that JEWS are behind the push into homosexuality.<br />\n<br />\nAs of 2004, other Anglican provinces, including the Anglican Church of Southern Africa and the Scottish Episcopal Church, permitted the ordination of gay clergy and others, such as the Episcopal Church in the USA, permitted blessing of same-sex unions as well. Today the Church blesses same-sex couples .<br />\n<br />\nOn 21 December 2005, Rt. Rev. David Jenkins, the former Bishop of Durham, offered a blessing for a vicar who had entered into a same-sex partnership. In 2008, St Bartholomew's Church in London offered a rite of blessing for two priests entering into a same-sex civil partnership.<br />\n<br />\nWHO KNOWS IN FUTURE MARRIAGE RITUALS BETWEEN HOMOSEXUALS WILL BE CONDUCTED IN POSITION 69.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2011, the General Synod voted to extend pensions and employee benefits to gay and lesbian priests living with their partners in civil unions<br />\n<br />\nIn 2013, the House of Bishops ruled that priests in same-sex civil partnerships could be consecrated as bishops.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2012, the Dean of St Paul's Cathedral, London, the Very Revd David Ison, announced his support for same-sex marriage and said that he had officiated at blessings or prayer services for same-sex couples<br />\n<br />\nThe Archbishop of Canterbury, Justin Welby, endorsed civil gay marriages and prayer ceremonies to mark the important occasion for same-sex couples.<br />\n<br />\nIn December 2015, the bishop of Buckingham announced his support for same-gender marriage within the church.. The Diocese of Chichester featured Gay Pride in Brighton and encouraged participation..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_23BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_22TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_22TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedD2pAD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_22B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2433886147309059957\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_22M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/open-letter-to-romila-thapar-from-capt.html?showComment=1541858063480#c2433886147309059957\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 10, 2018 at 7:24 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThe bishop of the Diocese of Liverpool has called for the church to be more inclusive of same-gender relationships. In 2018, the Diocese of St. Edmundsbury and Ipswich appointed the Revd Joe Hawes, who is in a civil gay partnership, as dean of the cathedral.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2016, the General Synod announced that, in response to the growing support for gay marriage, it will reconsider allowing blessing rites for same-gender couples entering into marriage. Additionally, an openly married gay priest was elected to the 2016 General Synod..<br />\n<br />\nIn September 2016, the Bishop of Grantham, the Rt Rev Nicholas Chamberlain, announced that he is gay and in a celibate relationship with his male partner becoming the first bishop to do so in the Anglican church.. In October 2017, the Diocese of Hereford voted in favour of a motion supporting liturgies for same-sex couples to dedicate a civil partnership or civil marriage in church.<br />\n<br />\nOn February 12, 2018, the Church of England's Education Office published a policy supporting sex education which includes, among other things, education concerning one's sexual desire. The policy stated that \"Sex education should include an understanding that all humans are sexual beings and that sexual desire is natural. Pupils should be taught that humans express their sexuality differently and that there is diversity in sexual desire.<br />\nIn February last year, the Archbishops of Canterbury and York announced that work is underway on issuing a new teaching document with \u201cradical Christian inclusion\u201d approach towards homosexuals ..<br />\n<br />\nThe Church of South India (CSI) is a liberal Protestant church which has, since 1984, allowed women to become pastors. In 2009, the Rev. Christopher Rajkumar, a presbyter in the Church of South India, stated that opposition to the rights of same-sex couples is a violation of human rights.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2009, Bishop V. Devashayam supported legal rights for gay people saying \"it is wrong to condemn people for their sexual orientation..<br />\n<br />\nIn 2015, St Mark's Cathedral in Bangalore, a congregation of the CSI, hosted a forum on preventing homophobia, and the Rev. Vincent Rajkumar advocated for the support of gay rights..<br />\n<br />\nDuring the week of the Primates' meeting in Canterbury, the CSI was listed by the BBC as being among the Anglican provinces open to blessing same-sex couples..<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU STAND ON THE STREETS OF LONDON EVERY SEVENTH PERSON WALKING PAST IS A HOMOSEXUAL.. 61% OF THEM ARE ON MENTAL MEDICATION..<br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA IT IS EVERY ONE OUT OF 1100 PEOPLE.. INDIA HAS THE LOWEST HOMOSEXUALS ON THE PLANET BY PERCENTAGE. THE FEW WE HAVE ARE THE RESULT OF INFUSION OF DIRTY INVADERS BLOOD.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedD2pAD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedD2pAD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8354986203840733387\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_25M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/open-letter-to-romila-thapar-from-capt.html?showComment=1541932246397#c2246937314956656961\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 11, 2018 at 4:00 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_54MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME ABOUT DEVAS AND ASURAS ..<br />\n<br />\nMANY INDIANS ARE UNDER THE MISCONCEPTION THAT DEVAS ARE GOOD WHILE DANAVAS ( ASURAS ) RE BAD..<br />\n<br />\nSORRY, THEY ARE JUST OPPOSING FORCES AND MAINLY COSMIC ALLEGORIES LIKE IN SAMUDRA MANTHAN.<br />\n<br />\nTHE FACT THAT NEITHER DEVAS OR ASURAS ARE INTRINSICCAY BAD IS ATTESTED IN THE RIG VEDA..<br />\n<br />\nSHIVA IS DESTROYED--THAT DOES NOT MEAN SHIVA IS BAD , AND BRAHMA AS CREATOR IS GOOD .. AGAIN BRAHMA/ SHIVA IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY.... .<br />\n<br />\nWATER VAPOR WHEN CONDENSED BECOME WATER --AND WATER WHEN EVAPORATED BECOMES WATER VAPOUR. THERE IS NO VILLAIN OR HERO HERE..<br />\n<br />\nIN ANCIENT PERSIA , DEVAS WERE THE BAD GUYS AND ASURAS WERE THE GOOD GUYS..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html<br />\n<br />\nIN THE ORIGINAL VEDA SRUTIS INDRA WAS AN ASURA.. BUT LATER IN THE VEDANTA INDRA WAS A DEVA..<br />\n<br />\nASURA IS MENTIONED 88 TIMES IN RIG VEDA ALONE.. WITH THE CONNOTATION OF \"MIGHTY\"..<br />\n<br />\n\u0939\u093f\u0930\u0923\u094d\u092f\u0939\u0938\u094d\u0924\u094b \u0905\u0938\u0941\u0930\u0903 \u0938\u0941\u0928\u0940\u0925\u0903 \u0938\u0941\u092e\u0943\u0933\u0940\u0915\u0903 \u0938\u094d\u0935\u0935\u093e\u0901 \u092f\u093e\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0919\u094d \u0964<br />\n\u0905\u092a\u0938\u0947\u0927\u0928\u094d\u0930\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0938\u094b \u092f\u093e\u0924\u0941\u0927\u093e\u0928\u093e\u0928\u0938\u094d\u0925\u093e\u0926\u094d\u0926\u0947\u0935\u0903 \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0924\u093f\u0926\u094b\u0937\u0902 \u0917\u0943\u0923\u093e\u0928\u0903 \u0965\u0967\u0966\u0965<br />\n<br />\nMay the golden-handed, life-bestowing, well-guiding, exhilarating and affluent Savitri [Asura] be present; for the deity, if worshipped in the evening, is at hand, driving away Rakshasas and Yatudhanas. \u2014\u2009Rigveda 1.35.10- 5000 BC ..<br />\n<br />\nIn Rig Veda, many divine personalities such as Rudra, Indra, Varuna, even Rishi Agni ( in Rig Veda 3:3:4)have been addressed as Asura. In Sanskrit language each letter carries a name and form, unlike most languages where words execute this function.&nbsp;</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Also there is a cryptic principle of \"&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Chanda</span></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">\" , due to which the same word when pronounced differently, denotes different meanings. Thus, Asura when pronounced differently, conveys markedly different meanings each time.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">While one pronunciation may mean \"an individual without crystallisation of personality / one who lacks discrimination ; a different pronunciation of Asura can also mean \" one who is a divine being and worthy son of his parental/preceptor lineage\".</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">In the Vedic sruti, the mere meaning is unimportant. One should be able to recite them with the correct rhythm (chanda), syllabic foot (vrutta) and measure of verse (matra). Only then is the real benefit obtained.</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nPanini said 7000 years ago<br />\n<br />\n\u0905\u0928\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0930\u0902 \u0939\u0924\u093e\u092f\u0941\u0937\u094d\u092f\u0902 \u0935\u093f\u0938\u094d\u0935\u0930\u0902 \u0935\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0927\u093f\u092a\u0940\u0921\u093f\u0924\u092e\u094d \u0964<br />\n\u0905\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0924\u093e \u0936\u0938\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0930\u0942\u092a\u0947\u0923 \u0935\u091c\u094d\u0930\u0902 \u092a\u0924\u0924\u093f \u092e\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0915\u0947 \u0964\u0964<br />\n<br />\nIf some of the consonants in a mantra are deleted then they destroy life, if the vowels (svar) are faulty then disease sets in. The consecrated rice (akshata) [consecrated with a mantra which has discordant vowels and omission of letters] descends upon the head of the host like a thunderbolt (vajra).<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nKa\u015byapa means \u201cClear vision\u201d. He has two wives, Diti which means \u201cduality\u201d and Aditi which means \u201dunified\u201d\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe offspring of Aditi are the Devas /Suras . The offspring of Diti are the Daityas/Asuras .<br />\n<br />\nIn Vedic srutis, all supernatural beings are called Devas and Asuras. Deva-Asura dichotomy is a spiritual concept rather than mere genealogical category or species of being.<br />\n<br />\nIn the Bh\u0101gavata Purana, saints and gods are born in families of Asuras, such as Mahabali and Prahlada, conveying the symbolism that motivations, beliefs and actions rather than one's birth and family circumstances define whether one is Deva-like or Asura-like.<br />\n<br />\nDeva is a masculine term; the feminine equivalent is Devi.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_54BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_54b+seedFIYND\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_53T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_53TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_54b+seedFIYND\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_53TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_53TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_53TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_54b+seedFIYND\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_53B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3459778126270820644\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_53M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/open-letter-to-romila-thapar-from-capt.html?showComment=1541932446060#c3459778126270820644\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 11, 2018 at 4:04 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_53MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS ARE 400 CENTURIES OLD.. WHILE BHAGAWAD GITA IS 60 CENTURIES OLD..<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Bhagavad Gita (16.6-16.7), all beings in the universe have both the divine qualities (daivi sampad) and the demonic qualities (asuri sampad) within each. Each Asura and Deva emerges from the same father (Prajapati), share the same residence (Loka), eat together the same food and drinks (Soma), and have innate potential, knowledge and special powers..<br />\n<br />\nin Hindu mythology; the only thing that distinguishes \"Asura who become Deva\" from \"Asura who remain Asura\" is intent, action and choices they make in their mythic lives.. A hymn of the Rigveda states Devav asura (Asuras who have become Devas), and contrasts it with Asura adevah (Asuras who are not Devas).<br />\n<br />\nIn the Upanishads, Devas and Asuras go to Praj\u0101pati to understand what is Self (Atman, soul) and how to realize it. The first answer that Praj\u0101pati gives is simplistic, which the Asuras accept and leave with, but the Devas led by Indra do not accept and question because Indra finds that he hasn't grasped its full significance.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n\u0926\u094d\u0935\u094c \u092d\u0942\u0924\u0938\u0930\u094d\u0917\u094c \u0932\u094b\u0915\u0947\u093d\u0938\u094d\u092e\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0948\u0935 \u0906\u0938\u0941\u0930 \u090f\u0935 \u091a |<br />\n\u0926\u0948\u0935\u094b \u0935\u093f\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0930\u0936: \u092a\u094d\u0930\u094b\u0915\u094d\u0924 \u0906\u0938\u0941\u0930\u0902 \u092a\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0925 \u092e\u0947 \u0936\u0943\u0923\u0941 || 6|| Bhagawad Gita 16.6 \u2013 4000 BC<br />\n<br />\ndvau bh\u016bta-sargau loke \u2019smin daiva \u0101sura eva cha<br />\ndaivo vistara\u015bha\u1e25 prokta \u0101sura\u1e41 p\u0101rtha me \u015bh\u1e5bi\u1e47u<br />\n<br />\nThere are two kinds of beings in this world\u2014those endowed with a divine nature and those possessing a demoniac nature. I have described the divine qualities in detail, O Arjun. Now hear from me about the demoniac nature.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0935\u0943\u0924\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0902 \u091a \u0928\u093f\u0935\u0943\u0924\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0902 \u091a \u091c\u0928\u093e \u0928 \u0935\u093f\u0926\u0941\u0930\u093e\u0938\u0941\u0930\u093e: |<br />\n\u0928 \u0936\u094c\u091a\u0902 \u0928\u093e\u092a\u093f \u091a\u093e\u091a\u093e\u0930\u094b \u0928 \u0938\u0924\u094d\u092f\u0902 \u0924\u0947\u0937\u0941 \u0935\u093f\u0926\u094d\u092f\u0924\u0947 || 7|| Bhagawad Gita 16.7\u20144000 BC<br />\n<br />\nprav\u1e5bitti\u1e41 cha niv\u1e5bitti\u1e41 cha jan\u0101 na vidur \u0101sur\u0101\u1e25<br />\nna \u015bhaucha\u1e41 n\u0101pi ch\u0101ch\u0101ro na satya\u1e41 te\u1e63hu vidyate<br />\n<br />\nThose possessing a demoniac nature do not comprehend what actions are proper and what are improper. Hence, they possess neither purity, nor good conduct, nor even truthfulness.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe nectar of immortality AMRIT is obtained only when the Devas and Asuras work together in unison and cooperation.<br />\n<br />\nIN AC ELECTRICITY ONCE YOU KNOW THE EARTH WIRE ( VISHNU- TRANSFORMER ) \u2014 YOU CAN INTERCHANGE POSITIVE AND NEGATIVE POLES ( LIKE CREATOR-BRAHMA AND DESTROYER-SHIVA )..<br />\n<br />\nAN INTELLIGENT MEN WILL NOT ARGUE THAT NORTH POLE IS BETTER THAN SOUTH POLE, ACID IS BETTER THAN ALKALI, CATHODE IS BETTER THAN ANODE, EVAPORATION IS BETTER THAN CONDENSATION ETC ..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_54b+seedFIYND\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_54b+seedFIYND\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<ol id=\"bc_0_78TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_77B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6464902082269247314\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_77M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THERE IS NO INTELLIGENCE IN THIS..<br /><br />AT SEA THE SHORTEST ROUTE IS NEVER THE FASTEST ROUTE... NOBODY CAN ASK THE CAPTAIN WHY HE CHOSE A LONGER ROUTE.. THE SHIP CAPTAIN IS EMPOWERED BY LAW TO USE HIS \"SUBJECTIVE\" DISCRETION..<br /><br />ABANDON SHIP CAN BE ANNOUNCED BY ONLY ONE MAN-- AND IT IS A SUBJECTIVE DECISION.. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IT HAS BECOME SO RIDICULOUS THAT WE LUMP\nJUDGMENTS AKIN TO&nbsp; &nbsp;\" SINCE WE SUSPECT BY CIRCUMSTANTIAL EVIDENCE THAT YOUR\nAUNTY HAS BALLS,&nbsp; WE DECLARE THAT FROM\nNOW ON SHE IS&nbsp; YOUR UNCLE\"..</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE NEED JUDGES TO BE RECRUITED BY AN\nINTELLIGENT SYSTEM LIKE IIT OR IAS..</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE ARE DONE WITH THE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE\nSCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL BECOMING LAWYERS AND THEN BOTTOM DREGS OF THE LOSER\nLAWYER POOL BECOMING MELORD JUDGES,&nbsp;&nbsp; WHO\nARE SO SQUEAMISH ( OUT OF INFERIORITY COMPLEX ) THAT THEY WILL SEND YOU TO JAIL FOR \"CONTEMPT OF COURT\n\" AT THE DROP OF A HAT.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">HEY YOU CAN ABUSE THE PM OF THE NATION,&nbsp;&nbsp; BUT DONT YOU DARE EVEN TELL THE TRUTH ABOUT\nA STUPID COLLEGIUM JUDGE,&nbsp; WHO IS WORSE IN THE CEREBRAL DEPARTMENT THAN A SOOTH SAYERS PARROT.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/we-people-declare-that-all-laws-created.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/we-people-declare-that-all-laws-created.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE HAD A PEA BRAINED \u2013 NAY- STUPID CJI , ( WHO\nTHANKFULLY HAS RETIRED ) , DIPAK MISRA WHO DECLARED IN A COCKY MANNER , THAT\nSUPREME COURT IS SUPREME AND CAN STRIKE DOWN ANY LAW MADE BY ELECTED AND\nACCOUNTABLE LAWMAKERS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">THANKFULLY HE GAVE AN EXTRA LONG FAREWELL\nSPEECH TO THE NATION LIVE ON TV .. &nbsp;THE\nWHOLE OF INDIA WAS APPALLED \u2013&nbsp; IS THIS CORNY\nFELLOW OUR CHIEF JUSTICE? &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS FELLOW COULD NOT ARTICULATE A SINGLE\nINTELLIGENT SENTENCE..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">INDIA HAS NOT PRODUCED AN INTELLECTUAL GIANT\nIN OUR JUDICIARY SINCE INDEPENDENCE\u2014 ALL MEN OF INFERIOR INTELLECT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let us have a peek at\nDipak Misra\u2019s moral fibre.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1985, a district\nmagistrate in Cuttack had declared that Dipak Misra had made a fraudulent\nrepresentation about his economic background to purchase a plot of land under a\ngovernment scheme.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The land remained in Misra\u2019s possession till the records\nwere corrected by the local administration in 2013, as was revealed in a probe\nby the Central Bureau of Investigation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nothing really happened\nafter these revelations. Misra continued with his judicial functions in the\napex court, and despite activists raising the question of propriety in his\nappointment to the country\u2019s top judicial position, he took oath of office on\nAug. 28, 2017.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">But then what can you\nexpect out of a lawyer turned judge ?&nbsp; Do\nlawyers tell the truth ?</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">SHALL WE HAVE A LOOK AT HOW MISRA BABY\nDECIDED THAT \u201d HUSBAND CANNOT BE THE MASTER OF A WIFE \u201c.. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">HE TOOK THE ADULTERY BUS !&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MUDDLED THINKING AT ITS BEST !!</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Section 497 of the\nIndian Penal Code was dealing with adultery. As per the Indian law, a woman\ncannot be punished for the offence of adultery. Only a man who has consensual sexual\nintercourse with the wife of another man without his consent can be punished\nunder this offense in India. If someone \"lives in adultery\", the\npartner can file for divorce. The law became defunct on 27 Sep 2018 by Supreme\nCourt of India. &nbsp;The Supreme Court called\nthe law unconstitutional because it \"treats a husband as the master\u201d (\nSIC)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Section 497 read as\nfollows:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Adultery.\u2014Whoever has sexual\nintercourse with a person who is and whom he knows or has reason to believe to\nbe the wife of another man, without the consent or connivance of that man, such\nsexual intercourse not amounting to the offense of rape, is guilty of the\noffense of adultery, and shall be punished with imprisonment of either\ndescription for a term which may extend to five years, or with fine, or with\nboth. In such case the wife shall not be punishable as an abettor.&nbsp; &nbsp;\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2014\u2009Section 497 of IPC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO SO SO -- A plain reading of the\nsection gives rise to various conclusions:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One, that the married\nwoman is not going to be regarded as an 'abettor' of the offence, which means\nthat the woman will not be held liable for the act of adultery- only the man\ninvolved in the act will be held criminally liable under the section.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Second, the law does\nnot apply in the case where an unmarried woman has intercourse with a married\nman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally, the act is not\nregarded to be an offence or can be 'cured' of its criminality if the husband\nof the married woman consents to her having intercourse with another man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition to this,\nSection 198 of the Code of Criminal Procedure gives only the husband the right\nto file a case against the man involved in the act of adultery. &nbsp;Thus, this section merely reinforces the\narchaic thinking and sexual stereotype that a woman 'belongs' to a man and\ncannot have her own thoughts or opinions; this, even if she had voluntarily\nconsented to the act of intercourse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of this\nproblematic interpretation, the Supreme Court in December 2017 decided to\naccept the public interest litigation in which it has been prayed that the\nCourt strikes down or completely does away with Section 497 of the Indian Penal\nCode entirely.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">JAI JAI INTERCOURSE !<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">BHARATEEYA INTERCOURSE\n!!<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS THE WAY BHARATMATA WAS KICKED INTO\nTHE KOSHER ADULTERY MANDI .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LET ME RECOUNT THE TRAVAILS OF BEERANKUTTY !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>HE RAN\nSKIPETTY SKIP AND BOUGHT A GOLD NECKLACE FOR HIS DEAR WIFE..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WANTING\nTO SURPRISE HER , HE QUIETLY OPENED THE BACKDOOR OF HIS HOME ,TIP TOED AND\nENTERED HIS BED ROOM..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHAT\nHE SAW MORTIFIED HIM..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THERE\nWAS HIS YOUNG WIFE ON THE BED BEING ASSAILED BY THREE OF HIS NEIGHBOURS FROM\nALL THREE ORIFICES.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>KNEE\nJERK HE UTTERED \u201c TALAAQ TALAAQ TALAAQ \u201c\u2014 LITERALLY ONE FOR EACH STUFFED HOLE.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>HE\nTHEN HAD THE PRESENCE OF MIND TO QUICKLY WHIP OUT HIS MOBILE PHONE AND TAKE\nCOUPLE OF DAMNING PHOTOS..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>ARMED\nWITH DAMNING EVIDENCE BEERANKUTTY RAN HOPPETY HOP TO THE POLICE STATION..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>ALAS\n\u2013..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>HE\nFOUND HIMSELF IN JAIL ON TWO CRITICAL CHARGES AS PER IPC.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>FIRST\nCHARGE: UTTERING TRIPLE TALAQ..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>SECOND\nCHARGE: INVADING THE PRIVACY OF HIS NEIGHBOURS ( ADULTERY LAW )..</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS\nIS THE CONDITION OF OUR WATAN TODAY..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS NO PROVISION\nFOR \u201cJUDICIAL REVIEW \u201c &nbsp;IN THE\nCONSTITUTION..&nbsp; &nbsp;THESE WORDS JUST DON\u2019T EXIST ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE JUDICIARY CAN ONLY REQUEST\nTHE LEGISLATURE ( ARTICLE 13 ) TO HAVE A SECOND LOOK IN CASE ANY &nbsp;LAW PASSED BY THE ELECTED AND ACCOUNTABLE\nLAWMAKERS TRAMPLE ON THE BASIC FUNDAMENTAL RIGHTS \u201cWE THE PEOPLE\u201d ENJOY UNDER\nOUR CONSTITUTION <b style=\"background-color: white;\">UNDER NORMAL CIRCUMSTANCES.</b>. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JUDICIARY DOES NOT HAVE\nTHE POWERS TO \u201cSTRIKE DOWN\u201d ANY LAW CREATED BY LAW MAKERS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LAWMAKERS HAVE MASSIVE POWERS\nUNDER ARTICLE 368 OF THE CONSTITUTION. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amending the\nConstitution of India is the process of making changes to the nation's\nfundamental law or supreme law. The procedure of amendment in the constitution\nis laid down in Part XX (Article 368) of the Constitution of India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The 24th amendment to\nthe Indian Constitution was enacted by the then Indira Gandhi government in\nNovember 1971. The objective was to nullify the Supreme Court\u2019s ruling that had\nleft the Parliament with no power to curtail the Fundamental Rights ( <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">when required for the integrity of the WATAN </span></span>) ..</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHEN MY SHIP IS SINKING,&nbsp; &nbsp;I DONT CARE FOR ANY LAW OR COMPANY POLICY</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clause (4) was inserted\nin Article 13, which states: \u201cNothing in this article shall apply to any\namendment of this Constitution made under article 368.\u201d This provision added\nmore power to the Parliament when it comes to amending the Constitution. It\nbrought Fundamental Rights within the purview of amendment procedure and\njudicial intervention or review of those amendments was prohibited.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All NYET sayers cried \u2013this\namendment is draconian .. Now it is obligatory for the President to give his\nassent when a Constitution Amendment Bill is submitted to him. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BALLS !&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 13 in The\nConstitution Of India 1949--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">13. Laws inconsistent\nwith or in derogation of the fundamental rights<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(1) All laws in force\nin the territory of India immediately before the commencement of this\nConstitution, in so far as they are inconsistent with the provisions of this\nPart, shall, to the extent of such inconsistency, be void<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(2) The State shall not\nmake any law which takes away or abridges the rights conferred by this Part and\nany law made in contravention of this clause shall, to the extent of the\ncontravention, be void<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(3) In this article,\nunless the context otherwise requires law includes any Ordinance, order, bye\nlaw, rule, regulation, notification, custom or usages having in the territory\nof India the force of law; laws in force includes laws passed or made by\nLegislature or other competent authority in the territory of India before the\ncommencement of this Constitution and not previously repealed, notwithstanding\nthat any such law or any part thereof may not be then in operation either at\nall or in particular areas<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(4) <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>Nothing in this\narticle shall apply to any amendment of this Constitution made under <span style=\"color: red;\">Article\n368</span> Right of Equality</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Collegium Judges don\u2019t\neven have the cerebral wherewithal to apply BODMAS on the constitution.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">President of India is\nvested with &nbsp;massive discretionary\nSUBJECTIVE powers to preserve the rule of DHARMA which is even above the WATAN.\n.&nbsp; President of India is NOT a rubber\nstamp..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In 1976 CIA / &nbsp;MOSSAD used their payroll stooges ( some in\nSardarjee fancy dress ) to bring down the Indira Gandhi govt.&nbsp; .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild\u2019s banks which\nIndira Gandhi nationalized needed to be brought back.. India was tilting too\nmuch to the Soviet side..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today Rothschild banks\nand Insurance companies have been given a&nbsp;\nfirm foothold again and DEEP STATE has got Bharatmata by her nostrils.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">NO JUDGE CAN GO BEYOND THE CONSTITUTION.. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ALL JUDGES CAN DO\nIS TO INTERPRET LAWS..&nbsp; &nbsp;JUDGES CANNOT STRIKE DOWN OR CREATE ANY LAWS\n..<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE CONSTITUTION IS A\nDYNAMIC DOCUMENT.. &nbsp;&nbsp;CONSTITUTION CANNOT\nBE USED AS A FRANKENSTEIN TO STRAITJACKET WE THE PEOPLE WHO ARE ABOVE THE\nCONSTITUTION... </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">TO MOVE WITH THE TIMES\u2014WHEN\nTHE BABY BECOME BIGGER , LENGTHEN &nbsp;THE\nCRADLE ( CONSTITUTION ) , DON\u2019T CUT THE LEGS OF THE BABY. &nbsp;WE ARE IN THE MODERN DIGITAL AGE\u2026 </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THE WATAN IS ABOVE \u201cWE THE PEOPLE\u201d.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RIGHT OF PRIVACY WAS\nUSED TO PUSH BHARATMATA INTO THE HOMOSEXUAL KOSHER MANDI.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MARK MY WORDS , VERY\nSOON IT WILL BE INCEST\u2014THEN BESTIALITY\u2014THEN NECROPHILIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/right-to-privacy-in-india-is-not.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/right-to-privacy-in-india-is-not.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PIL is no longer a\nweapon to help the poor and the underprivileged. Rather, &nbsp;it has become a tool to \u201cshift the course\u201d of\njustice\u2014 so easy , because our Collegium judges are pea brained.</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now a PIL is used\neither to settle scores or to get something from someone. A petition may look\nlike a genuine PIL but if you are good in RCA ( root cause analysis ) &nbsp;its motive is almost always ULTERIOR..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again the words &nbsp;JUDICIAL REVIEW is not mentioned in The\nConstitution of India. Article 13 of Indian Constitution just provides for the \u201cdoctrine\u201d\nof judicial review.&nbsp; &nbsp; It declares that all laws that are inconsistent with or in\nderogation of any of the fundamental rights shall be void.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again fundamental\nrights ( example PRIVACY ) &nbsp;are not\nabsolute.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A LEGAL DOCUMENT IS AN\nASS.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AT SEA WHEN I WANTED TO\nINTERPRET A LEGAL DOCUMENT&nbsp; I ASKED MY\nWIFE TO DO IT\u2014AS I WOULD BE MENTALLY STRAIT JACKETED BY PRE-CONCEIVED NOTIONS..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF A WORD \u201c<b style=\"background-color: white;\">SHALL </b>\u201c IS\nCONVERTED TO \u201c<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SHOULD</b>\u201d ( BY CHICANERY ) THE WHOLE COLOUR OF THE LEGAL DOCUMENT CHANGES..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
