All cognitive awareness appears as if it is\ninterpenetrated with language.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the language\nimpregnated nature went away from it, then a cognition would not manifest (any\nobject), for that (language impregnated nature) is the distinguishing nature of\nour cognitive awareness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhartrhari's thinking &nbsp;spanned the diverse disciplines of philosophy,\npsychology and theology. &nbsp;Bhartrhari as a\nGrammarian, metaphysician, and poet has come close to revealing the fundamental\nnature of consciousness itself.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From the point of view\nof Bhartrhari's sphota or the notion that language is an integral part of our\nconsciousness, both speech and writing can be the 'illuminator' of the sphota.\nOne is not primary and the other does not distort the sphota. Both 'transform'\nthe untransformable, unmodifiable sphota, which is part and parcel of everybody's\nconsciousness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas reiterate\nthat word contains in it unique potency and power, word is eternal, word is all\npervading and so you&nbsp; utter a word and it\nspreads quickly in the entire word. God too is eternal and pervades in the\nentire universe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For such relativity or similarity of attributes word is called\nBrahman, the Shabda -Brahman. Word is worshipped as Brahman, and a worship of\nthe NaadBrahman prevails in India in all religious practices since the\nantiquity till the present time.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u0925\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u093e\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092a\u0926\u094d\u092f\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0924\u093e\u0902\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0925\u0948\u0935</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092d\u091c\u093e\u092e\u094d\u092f\u0939\u092e\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u092e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0924\u094d\u092e\u093e\u0928\u0941\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0924\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u0928\u0941\u0937\u094d\u092f\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">:\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0925</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0936</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">:\n|| 11|| <b>Bhagawad Gita 4.11 \u2013 4000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ye yath\u0101 m\u0101\u1e41\nprapadyante t\u0101ns tathaiva bhaj\u0101myaham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">mama vartm\u0101nuvartante\nmanu\u1e63hy\u0101\u1e25 p\u0101rtha sarva\u015bha\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In whatever way people\nsurrender unto me, I reciprocate with them accordingly. Everyone follows my\npath, knowingly or unknowingly, O son of Pritha.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whoever worships me in\nwhatever form I attain that form\u201d. This kind of call&nbsp; by Krishna gives rise to worship of multiple\nforms of God and man enjoys a liberty to worship any form. This is the freedom\nSanatana Dharma affords.. We are not strait jacketed to a man on a cross or a\nnaked man sitting n the ground.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedic sages worshipped\nall&nbsp; those natural gods in the universe\nthat create life, sustain it and end it for new creation. They believed that\nGods protect life and wellbeing of all human and other lives on the earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0905\u0928\u0928\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0936\u094d\u091a\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0924\u092f\u0928\u094d\u0924\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u093e\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u091c\u0928\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">:\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u0930\u094d\u092f\u0941\u092a\u093e\u0938\u0924\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0924\u0947\u0937\u093e\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0928\u093f\u0924\u094d\u092f\u093e\u092d\u093f\u092f\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093e\u0928\u093e\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u094b\u0917\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0947\u092e\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u0939\u093e\u092e\u094d\u092f\u0939\u092e\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|| 22|| <b>Bhagawad Gita Chapter 9.22<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">anany\u0101\u015bh chintayanto m\u0101\u1e41\nye jan\u0101\u1e25 paryup\u0101sate<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">te\u1e63h\u0101\u1e41 nity\u0101bhiyukt\u0101n\u0101\u1e41\nyoga-k\u1e63hema\u1e41 vah\u0101myaham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are those who\nalways think of Me and engage in exclusive shraddha to Me. To them, whose minds\nare always absorbed in Me, I provide what they lack and preserve what they\nalready possess.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna promises, or\nrather assures in the Bhagavad Gita, \u201cYogakshema vahamyaham \u201c.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He assures that\nhe will respond positively to man who worships any form. Such a liberty allows\nworship of multiple forms of God. As a worship of multiple forms of God emerged\nand flourished, a body of literature containing hymns based on thousand names\nof God too flourished as the Sahasranama literature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the beginning,\nBrahman who is one without a second, alone exists. When darkness was rolling\nover darkness, there was existence alone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Brahman, there was a\nSpandana or vibration before the world was projected. This is the Sankalpa of\nBrahman. He thought or willed: \"Ekoham Bahu Syam: I am the one; let me be\nmultiple\". <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This vibration\ncorresponds to the bulging of the seed within the ground when it is soaked with\nwater. Then the whole world was projected.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concept of multiple\ngods and their multiple names is unique and true about natural religion that\nthe Vedas propagate in origin&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Vedic religion was at its core\nnaturalistic. It had a simple logic. One works for you and you appreciate it.\nOne who helps you in any way becomes important for you. This simple logic may\nbecome special as intensity of a need increases. A devotee feels on his part\nintensity that arouses in him about feeling of urgency and gratitude to God who\nsupports him in all respects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Vedic times,\neach element in nature contributed to the survival of human life and man\u2019s well\nbeing. Vedic sages, therefore, set up a practice to offer gratitude through performance\nof yajna and singing hymns and prayers to all elements in nature for what they\ndo for human survival.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a result, a practice of worshipping many gods emerged\ncoupled with sentiments of gratitude.. The moment a man is filled with\ngratitude his DNA starts emitting scalar healing waves. Every Vedic sruti has\ngratitude embedded in it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike western&nbsp; religion like the Christianity, the Islam and\nmany other monolithic religions in the world, Sanatana Dharma prefers to keep\naway from prescriptive or dogmatic instinct and to impose it over its followers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This world is not a\nworld of dead matter, but a living Presence. Brahman or the Absolute manifests\nItself as the universe through forms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creation is a joyous\nself-expression of the One. It is Brahman alone that shines as the world of\nvariegated objects. Brahman Himself appears as stone, tree, stars, etc. The One\nConsciousness alone appears as the universe of plurality.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole universe is\nBrahman only in essence. All this is Brahman only, appearing in Brahman and\nthrough Brahman. Earth, food, fire and sun are forms of Brahman. East, west,\nnorth and south are parts of the Lord. The sky, heaven, ocean are portions of\nBrahman. Breath is a part of Brahman. Sight is a part of Brahman. Hearing is a\npart of Brahman. Mind is a part of Brahman.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This life is Brahman. Brahman or\nTruth is the essence in which the universe has its being, from which it is\nborn, and in which it dissolves at the end of each world-cycle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An effect does not\nexist apart from its cause. A pot does not exist apart from clay. This universe\ndoes not exist apart from Brahman. It has no independent existence. It is one\nwith Brahman. Brahman is one. Manifestation is many.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One has become many.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As\nfrom a blazing fire, sparks all similar to one another, come forth in\nthousands, so also, from the one imperishable Brahman proceed all breathing\nanimals, all worlds, all the gods, and all beings.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Atoms rotate continuously.\nOld becomes new and new becomes old. In reality, there is no such thing as old;\nthere is no such thing as new. The Jivas with individual minds are witnessing the\nevents in succession. But the Isvara knows all events at one sweep. He is\nall-knowing. He is all-understanding also. He knows every detail of His\ncreation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This vast\nsense-universe shines as Atma-sankalpa. The Cosmic Mind creates the Maya.\nIndividual minds receive things under delusion. You can know Brahman only by\nbecoming Brahman. To become Brahman is to identify yourself with the divine\nelement\u2014the Supreme Soul\u2014which constitutes your essential nature.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Knower of\nBrahman becomes Brahman. The river joins the ocean and becomes one with the\nocean. The drop mixes with the sea and becomes one with the sea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_102TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_101B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4178512269513947391\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_101M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May 4, 2018 at 10:44 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I ASK MY TELUGU READERS\nTO SPREAD THIS COMMENT \u2013IF YOU WANT TRUTH TO PREVAIL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a passage from\nmy social studies book while at school<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE : The great\nBuddhist Stupa of Amaravati, the Maha chaitya, is one of the greatest\narchitectural achievement of ancient India. The monument was situated on the\noutskirts of the town of Amaravati near the ancient ruined city of Dharanikota.\nIt was founded in the 3rd-2nd centuries BC during Ashoka Maurya' reign UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUT ALAS\u2014EMPEROR ASHOKA\nNEVER EXISTED. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1541300849014#c2924249917854403916\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 4, 2018 at 8:37 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_45MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWE ASK AJIT DOVAL AND RAJNATH SINGH TO PROFILE JOHN BRITTAS , THE ATHEIST COMMIE JOURNALIST WHO IS THE BLUE EYED BOY OF COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYAN..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE BEEN CLOSELY MONITORING THIS DESH DROHI FOR A LONG TIME.<br />\n<br />\nHE HAS THE ABILITY TO DELIVER BACK HANDED SLAPS.. TO HINDUS, INDIAN CULTURE AND THE WATAN.. TERRIFIC INNUENDO..<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE?<br />\n<br />\nTODAY , 4TH OCT 2018, AT 0745 , HE WAS LEADING A DISCUSSION ABOUT AYYAPPA..<br />\n<br />\nTHEN HE SAYS AYYAPPA ( VISHNUs NINTH AVATAR ) IS NASTIKA BRAHMACHARI-- BUT CAN WE EVER CONSIDER KRISHNA ( VISHNUs EIGHT AVATAR ) TO BE A SIMILAR NASTIKA BRAHMACHARI-- WITH A SARCASTIC SMILE , ELUCIDATING A SIMILAR SARCASTIC RESPONESE FROM THE PARTICIPANTS ON STAGE AND THE LEANINGS BASED SELECTED AUDIENCE ..<br />\n<br />\nI MUST TELL THIS TO CULTURAL TERRORIST JOHN BRITTAS..<br />\n<br />\nKRISHNAs MISTRESS RADHA NEVER EXISTED.. WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OF RADHA TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nKALIDAS WHO WROTE ABOUT RADHA NEVER EXISTED.. NOT A SINGE DASA OF THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT EXISTED ..BHAKTI MVOVEMENT NEVER EXISTED.. HINDUS DO SHRADDHA , NOT BHAKTI..<br />\n<br />\nTHE CHRISTIANS AND ATHEISTS AND ZAKIR NAIK MADE A GREAT DEAL OF KRISHNA BEING A WOMANISER.. THAT HE WAS FROLICKING WITH 16000 VIRGIN GOPIKA DAMSELS, WHOM HE DEFLOWERED....<br />\n<br />\nDEVDUTT PATTANAIK HAS BEEN REGULARLY DENIGRATING KRISHNA-- THE LAST I HEARD HIM TELLING ON EPIC TV THAT KRISHNA WAS A CROSS DRESSER AND HE USED TO EXCHANGE CLOTHES WITH RADHA ..<br />\n<br />\nHULLO EX-JNU STUDENT COMMIE JOHN BRITTAS... YOUR MIND IS SO SHALLOW AND FULL OF POISON-- YET, TRY ND UNDERSTAND THIS..WE KNOW YOU DONT HAVE THE BALLS TO INSULT ISLAM..<br />\n<br />\n16000 GOPIKAS ALLUDE TO THE 16000 DHATUS OF SAHASRARA CHAKRA WHICH IS A 1000 PETALLED LOTUS IN FULL BLOOM ..EACH PETAL WITH 16 KALAS ( ASPECTS ) ...<br />\n<br />\nNARAKASURA KIDNAPPED 16000 GOPIKAS WHOM KRISHNA SAVED --THIS IS JUST AN ALLEGORY..<br />\n<br />\nIN SANATANA DHARMA ALL GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES ,, EXCEPT VISHNU AVATARS RAMA, KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY DESH DROHI LITERARY FEST --HAD ATHEIST COMMIES AND WHITE CHRISTIANS SINGING PRAISES OF KRISHNAs MISTRESS RADHA AND HER BOLD SEXUALITY ..<br />\n<br />\nJAYADEVA WHO INVENTED RADHA NEVER EXISTED. HE WAS A FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATION OF JEW ROTHSCHILD.<br />\n<br />\nOdissi dance was created by the white invader to propagate the FAKE Radha. Jayadeva's ashtapadis are sung in dance performances of Odissi. Oriya bhajans are all ragas and talas specified by COOKED UP Jayadeva's hymns.<br />\n<br />\nTHE FAKE MUTTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD SPREAD THE FAKE WORK OF JAYADEVA \"GITA GOVINDA \" PACKED WITH KRISHNA RADHA EROTICA AND SEX ..<br />\n<br />\nAMITABH BACHCHAN PROPAGATES LIES ON TV SHOW KBC-- THAT BUDDHA IS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU, THAT JAYADEVA IS THE COURT POET OF KING LAKSHMANASENA OF BENGAL GETTING ORIYAS HOPPING MAD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HINDU HATING ITALIAN WAITRESS RELEASED STAMPS OF JAYADEVA IN 2009.. SHE DOES NOT KNOW THAT THE GLORY OR ANCIENT ROME IS HINDU.. THAT JESUS WAS COOKED UP BY THE ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTINE THE GREAT IN 325 AD AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA .<br />\n<br />\nJESUS WAS MODELED AFTER A KERALA SAGE NAMED APOLLONIUS OF TYANA.. ALL CAESARS AND ROMANS SENATORS WERE HINDU..<br />\n<br />\nEPIC MAHABHARATA HAS NEVER MENTIONED RADHA..<br />\n<br />\nSABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE , THIS PLANETs LARGEST , HAS BEEN GOING ON FOR 5900 YEARS ..<br />\n<br />\nHEY COMMIE JOHN BRITTAS -- IF YOU WANT TO KNOW HINDUISM READ THE 114 PART BLOG SERIES BELOW..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_45BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; WHY IS THIS ALLOWED ?-- THE MAIN IDEA IS TO IDENTIFY COMMIE CADRE AND STOP THEIR PERKS..<br />\n<br />\nIS INDIA A DEMOCRACY ?<br />\n<br />\nWHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON ?<br />\n<br />\nEVERY MAIN STREAM MEDIA ( DEEP STATE ) EXCEPT JANAM TV IS ON THE SIDE OF COMMIE ATHIEST PINARAYI VIJAYAN--WHY ?<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW THE CONSPIRACY TO KILL SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE --<br />\n<br />\nRSS PACKED WITH CHILDLESS CHITPAVAN JEWS.. IS THE FOUNTAIN HEAD OF THIS CONSPIRACY ..<br />\n<br />\nRSS WAS THE FIRST TO WELCOME THE SUPREME COURT RULINGS ON HOMOSEXUALITY AND ADULTERY...<br />\n<br />\nNOT A SINGLE RSS CHIEF SINCE THIS ORG WAS FOUNDED HAS MARRIED--WHY ? THEY WERE BRAHMACHARIS?.. OH YEAH ?..<br />\n<br />\nSORRY THIS BRAHMACHARYA CONCEPT PROPAGATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS GANDHI AND VIVEKANNADA DOES NOT BELONG TO SANATANA DHARMA..<br />\n<br />\nThe technical meaning of Brahmacharya is self-restraint, particularly mastery of perfect control over the senses- not the PRICK or DICK or LODA alone...<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is the virtue of celibacy when unmarried and fidelity when married..<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is a means, not an end. It usually includes cleanliness, ahimsa, simple living, studies, meditation, and voluntary restraints on certain foods, intoxicants, and behaviors-(including sexual behavior)...<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD ENCOURAGED HOMOSEXUALS AND IMPOTENT MEN TO BECOME GURUS... I KNOW THE CURRENT AND PAST SET OF HOMOSEXUAL / IMPOTENT GURUS...<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANDA DID EXTENSIVE MEDICAL TESTS IN USA FOR 33 DISEASES..<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA USED TO GIVE BULL TO ALL AND SUNDRY THAT HE PRESERVED HIS SEMEN FOR 12 YEARS --AND THAT IS WHY HE IS SO BRAINY AND HEALTHY..<br />\n<br />\nHE WENT TO VIVEKANDA ROCK ( KANYA KUMARI ) NOT TO MEDITATE FOR WORLD PEACE--<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS SENT THERE BY KOTTAKKAL ARYA VAIDYA SALA TO CURE HIS ASTHMA ( AYURVEDIC SALT SPRAY TREATMENT )..<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA IS GUILTY OF ALLOWING HINDUISM TO BE BRANDED AS FULL OF SUPERSTITION \u2014 WHEN THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO SUPERSTITION , OTHER THAN WHAT HIS BOSS ROTHSCHILD INJECTED..<br />\n<br />\nDONT MAKE ME SAY ANYTHING MORE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_10B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3218814970497086894\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_10M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/the-indian-constitution-does-not-allow.html?showComment=1541402414156#c3218814970497086894\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 5, 2018 at 12:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_10MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMOST IMPORTANT COMMENT:<br />\nMOST IMPORTANT COMMENT:<br />\nMOST IMPORTANT COMMENT:<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/judiciary-in-contempt-of-we-people-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE ATHEIST COMMIE CM OF KERALA PINARAYI VIJAYAN IS HELL BENT OF BREAKING THE SPINE OF SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE..<br />\n<br />\nTHE MOST IMPORTANT ASPECT IS \u201cNEY ABHISHEKHAM\u201d. ( GHEE SACRIFICE )..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS NOT THE MALE HUSBAND OR SON ALONE THAT BENEFITS FROM THE PILGRIMAGE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WIFE FILLS UP A COCONUT WITH DESI GHEE ( USING THE MIDDLE EYE OF THE COCONUT ) IN FRONT OF THE AYYAPPA IDOL OR PICTURE OF HER HOME BESIDE A LIT LAMP..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS GHEE FILLED COCONUT IS CARRIED INSIDE THE IRUMUDI KETTU ON THE HEAD OF THE MALE PILGRIM..<br />\n<br />\nHE WILL NOT ALLOW THE IRUMUDI KETU TO TOUCH THE GROUND TILL HE CLIMBS UP THE 18 STEPS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE KERALA POLICE IS DOING BLASPHEMY BY ORDERING THE PILGRIM TO OPEN THE IDRUMUDI KETTU , AS IF THERE IS A TIME BOMB INSIDE.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS GHEE IS POURED ON THE AYYAPPA IDOL INSIDE THE SANNIDHANAM.. TIMING WINDOW IS FROM 0330 AM TO 7 AM AND THEN 0830 TO 1100 AM..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS GHEE IS GIVEN BACK AS PRASADMA AND THE PILGRIM GOES BACK HOME WITH THIS GHEE FOR HIS WIFE ( OR MOTHER WHO FILLED THE COCONUT ) TO CONSUME ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS EQUIVALENT TO THE MENSTRAUTING WOMAN UNDERTAKING THE PILGRIMAGE HERSELF..<br />\n<br />\nAS THE MALE PILGRIMS WALKS TOWARDS SABARIMALA UNDER A GURUSAMI , THEY CHANT JOYOUSLY \u201c NEY ABHISHEKAM SWAMIKKE \u201c ..<br />\n<br />\nNEY ABHISHKAM HAS PUJA TIMINGS AT DAWN ..<br />\n<br />\nIF THE PILGRIMS IS FORCED BACK BY THE KERALA POLICE ON COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYANs ORDERS , HE CANNOT DO THE NEY ABHISHEKAM.. THE SPINE OF THIS SOLEMN ENDEAVOUR IS BROKEN..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nFor those pilgrims who have not observed the purity ( say he masturbated ) during his trek to Sabarimala , he will not take back the ghee he brought inside the coconut, there is a container called Neythoni (Ghee Canoe) into which they pour out the ghee. He goes back home empty handed sans prasadham..<br />\n<br />\nThe wife understands as the ghee would hurt her..<br />\n<br />\nThis pilgrimage is then not considered to be ACCOMPLISHED.<br />\n<br />\nIf later he has to become a guruswamy, he has to count how many ties he took the ghee prasadam back home to the woman who filled it..<br />\n<br />\nIt has to be 18 times..<br />\n<br />\nThere is no fooling anybody here , including yourself..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS RITUAL HAS GONE ON FOR 5900 YEARS..<br />\n<br />\nNOW WE HAVE AN ATHEIST COMMIE CM NAMED PINARAYI VIJAYAN WHO HAS UNLEASHED A STALIN TYPE REIGN OF TERRROR ..<br />\n<br />\nHE HAS SELF DESTRUCTED..<br />\n<br />\nHE IS BEYOND CARE !<br />\n<br />\nCOMMUNIST PARTY IS DEAD \u2013THE LAST BASTION OF KERALA HAS CRUMBLED, DUE TO ONE MANs GOONDAGIRI..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_10BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE UNELECTED /\nUNACCOUNTABLE&nbsp; JUDICIARY CANNOT MAKE OR\nBREAK LAWS..&nbsp; ALL THEY ARE ALLOWED TO DO\nIS TO INTERPRET EXISTING LAWS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN OUR CASE THE\nJUDICIARY IS A COLLEGIUM SYSTEM\u2014WHICH MEANS JUDGES ELECT JUDGES..&nbsp;&nbsp; THIS IS NOT ALLOWED BY OUR\nCONSTITUTION.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIA IS THE ONLY\nNATION ON THE PLANET WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES .. THIS BREEDS NEPOTISM AND\nTRAITORS IN DEEP STATE PAYROLL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In June 12, 1975\nverdict of the Allahabad High Court convicting then Prime Minister Indira\nGandhi of electoral malpractices and debarring her from holding any elected\npost..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The verdict delivered\nby Justice Jagmohanlal Sinha, led to imposition of Emergency in India on June\n25, 1975.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Justice Jagmohal Lal is\ninfamous for his 1975 ruling in the State of Uttar Pradesh v. Raj Narain\nlawsuit in which he invalidated the election of Prime Minister Indira Gandhi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The petition challenged\nher election to the Lok Sabha in 1971 from the Rae Bareli parliamentary\nconstituency in Uttar Pradesh, which MAD CAP Raj Narain had also contested..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The judgement in itself\nran to 259 pages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indira Gandhi was\ndeclared guilty of corrupt practices and her election to the Lok Sabha was\ndeclared null and void. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On an appeal filed by\nIndira Gandhi, Justice VR Krishna Iyer \u2013 a vacation judge of the Supreme Court\n- on June 24, 1975 granted a conditional stay on Justice Sinha\u2019s verdict\nallowing her to continue as Prime Minister. However, she was debarred from\ntaking part in parliamentary proceedings and draw salary as an MP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the Emergency was\nin force, the Supreme Court later overturned her conviction on November 7,\n1975.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The moment Emergency\nwas declared , Indira Gandhi got Raj Narain arrested and imprisoned on the same\nday along with several leading opposition leaders including J.P. Narayan, Morarji\nDesai, Satyendra Narayan Sinha, Charan Singh and Atal Bihari Vajpayee ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SWAMY, MODI, GEORGE\nFERNANDES ETC WERE ALL SIKHS IN DISGUISE..EVADING ARREST..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS HEALTH MINISTER MAD\nCAP RAJ NARAIN WENT ON A INDIAN NAVY SHIP --AND ADDRESSED A GATHERING OF HIGH\nRANKING ADMIRALS , COMMODORES , CAPTAINS.. \" ITNA BADA JAHAAZ , SAMUDRA KE\nSHANTI KE OOPAR ? font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SUPREME COURT JUDGES\nCREATE NEW LAWS AGAIN AND AGAIN USING PIL OF FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs..</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE ARE SOME NATIONS\nON THIS PLANET WHERE EACH AND EVERY JUDGE IS APPOINTED BY ZIONIST JEW BIG\nBROTHER .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION\nHAS NOT GIVEN THE JUDICIARY ANY POWER, OTHER THAN TO JUDGE A CASE PRESENTED TO\nTHEM BY AN AGGRIEVED PERSON. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">IN OUR CASE WHENEVER\nTHE DEEP STATE WANTS A NEW LAW IN INDIA THEY DO IT VIA THEIR OWN FOREIGN FUNDED\nDESH DROHI NGOs BY SUBVERTING ARTICLE 39A OF THE CONSTITUTION</span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">(39A)&nbsp; Equal justice and free legal aid--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe State shall secure\nthat the operation of the legal system promotes justice, on a basis of equal\nopportunity, and shall, in particular, provide free legal aid, by suitable\nlegislation or schemes or in any other way, to ensure that opportunities for\nsecuring justice are not denied to any citizen by reason of economic or other\ndisabilities.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inserted by the\nConstitution (Forty-second Amendment) Act, 1976, section 8 (w.e.f. 3-1-1977).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 42nd amendment to\nConstitution of India, officially known as The Constitution (Forty-second\namendment) Act, 1976, was enacted during the Emergency (25 June 1975 \u2013 21 March\n1977) by the Indian National Congress government headed by Indira Gandhi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">ARTICLE 39 A HAS BEEN\nHIJACKED BY THE KOSHER DEEP STATE TO CREATE&nbsp;\nNEW LAWS IN INDIA USING THEIR PAYROLL JUDGES BY PIL ROUTE .</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;THE NEW BULLSHIT DISHED OUT WAS&nbsp; --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; PIL mechanism has loosened the strict\n\"locus standi\" requirements to permit filing of petitions on behalf\nof marginalized and deprived sections of the society by public spirited\nindividuals, institutions and/or bodies : &nbsp;UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY, WE ALL KNOW WHAT\nPRASHANT BHUSHAN AND HIS ILK ARE UPTO USING PIL FILED BY FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARTICLE 39 A IS FOR\nFREE LEGAL AID TO PROVIDE SOCIAL JUSTICE&nbsp;\n..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TODAY IT HAS BEEN\nHIJACKED TO COLLEGIUM JUDGE CREATING OR BREAKING DOWN LAWS.. EXAMPLE:&nbsp; &nbsp;ADULTERY LAW&nbsp;\n.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE HAVE FIVE COLLEGIUM\nJUDGES ( COLLEGIUM SYSTEM IS ILLEGAL ) MAKING LAWS FOR 1300 MILLION INDIANS.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO SO SO--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALLOWING YOUR NEIGHBOR\nOR HER OFFICE PEON TO FUCK YOUR WIFE IS \u201cSOCIAL JUSTICE\u201d ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHERE IS IT GOING TO\nEND , WITH OUR JUDICIARY PACKED WITH PEA BRAINED \u201cLAWYERS TURNED JUDGES \u201c? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHICH RELIGION ALLOWS\nADULTERY ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 21 reads as:--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cNo person shall be\ndeprived of his life or personal liberty except according to a procedure\nestablished by law.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 21 secures two\nrights:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1)&nbsp; Right to life</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">2) Right to personal\nliberty<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Article prohibits\nthe deprivation of the above rights except according to a procedure established\nby law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018Life\u2019 in Article 21 of\nthe Constitution is not merely the physical act of breathing. It does not connote\nmere animal existence or continued drudgery through life. It has a much wider\nmeaning which includes right to live with human dignity, right to livelihood,\nright to health, right to pollution free air, etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prior to 1977, only the\naggrieved party could personally knock the doors of justice and seek remedy for\nhis grievance and any other person who was not personally affected could not\nknock the doors of justice as a proxy for the victim or the aggrieved party.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nother words, only the affected parties had the locus standi (standing required\nin law) to file a case and continue the litigation and the non affected persons\nhad no locus standi to do so. And as a result, there was hardly any link\nbetween the rights guaranteed by the Constitution of Indian Union and the laws\nmade by the legislature on the one hand and the vast majority of illiterate\ncitizens on the other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subjects Of Public\nInterest Litigation--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">i) bonded labour\nmatters<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ii) matters of\nneglected children<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">iii) exploitation of\ncasual labourers and non-payment of wages to them (except in individual cases)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">iv) matters of\nharassment or torture of persons belonging to Scheduled Castes, Scheduled\nTribes and Backward Castes, either by Police or by co-villagers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">v) matters relating to\nenvironmental pollution, disturbance of ecological balance, drugs, food\nadulteration, maintenance of heritage and culture, antiques, forests and wild\nlife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">vi) petitions from riot\nvictims and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">vii) Petitions against\npolice for refusing to register a case, harassment by police, death in police\ncustody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">viii) Petitions against\natrocities on women, in particular harassment of bride, bride-burning, rape,\nmurder, kidnapping etc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ix) other matters of\npublic importance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUT WHERE DOES IT\nALLUDE THAT A PERSONs WIFE CAN BE FUCKED BY HER NEIGHBOR WHEN HER HUSBAND IS\nOUT OF THE HOUSE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prashant Bhushan\u2019s NGO\nCentre for Public Interest Litigation (CPIL) must be fined heavily . Lawyer\nPrashant Bhushan and DEEP STATE judges who pander to his shenanigans&nbsp; must be defrocked for subverting the\nconstitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indeed , Public\ninterest litigation ( PIL ) is a highly effective weapon in the armory of law\nfor reaching social justice to the common man . It is a unique phenomenon in\nthe Indian Constitutional Jurisprudence that has no parallel in the world and\nhas acquired a big significance in the modern legal concerns.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This technique is\nconcerned with the protection of the interest of a class or group of persons\nwho are either the victims of governmental lawlessness, or social oppression or\ndenied their constitutional or legal rights and who are not in a position to\napproach the court for the redressal of their grievances due to lack of\nresources or ignorance or their disadvantaged social and economic position.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;But why have we allowed PIL system to be\nhijacked? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A crypto Jew lawyer\nnamed Naushad Khan ( non-aggrieved person ) wanted menstruating women in\nSabarimala.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">99.999 % Hindu women\ndon\u2019t agree ..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet it has been made a\nlaw ( when Judges cannot create laws ) , with ATHEIST COMMIE Pinarayi Viyayan\n\u201cdoing a Stalin \u201c over its implementation..&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is kicking long\nstanding priceless culture&nbsp; \u201csocial\njustice \u201c ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TODAY THE INDIAN\nJUDICIAL PROCESS IS JUST A CHARADE.&nbsp; A\nMINDLESS ACTIVITY TRAP BY PEA BRAINED JUDGES WHO ARE WORSE THAN LIKE SOOTH\nSAYERs PARROTS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEN\nHOW COME FIVE ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDGES MANAGED IT\u2014WITH THE BLESSINGS OF\nCHILDLESS FELLOW MODI ( STANDING IN THE SHADOWS )?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today foreign forces\nuse their NGOs to file PILs - for corporate gain, political advantage or vested\npersonal interest .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As long as Sabarimala\nPilgrimage exists it is NOT possible for Vatican to convert the poor tribal to\nChristianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NE states were all\nHindu. &nbsp;&nbsp;After just two decades of\nmassive conversions ( with the blessing of the Italian waitress ) , these NE\nstates are now Christian.&nbsp;&nbsp; Today NE\nstates are a vote bank for a Christian ruler.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tamil Nadu coastal belt\nwas converted to Christianity when MGR was propped up as a vegetable on a\nchair.. &nbsp;&nbsp;Today these Tamil converts allow\nwhite Christians to steal the Thorium at night from the beaches.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The alphabet P of PIL\nis no longer stands for PUBLIC&nbsp; --it\nstands for POLITICAL. Collegium judges burn midnight oil to create a law by\nsunrise for a PIL received at sunset . This re-arranging of priorities have\ncaused a huge backlog of cases in the supreme court <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">PIL HAS HIJACKED OUR\nJUSTICE SYSTEM..&nbsp; A CLEAR CASE IS THAT\nHOMOSEXUALITY AND ADULTERY HAS BEEN LEGALIZED IN INDIA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TOMORROW IF YOU 8 YEAR\nOLD SON TRAVELS BY BUS AND A GAY PERVERT FONDLES HIS PRICK, NOTHING CAN BE\nDONE.&nbsp;&nbsp; IT IS LEGAL..&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NO HOMOSEXUAL HAS EVER BEEN SUBJECTED TO\nPOSCO.. SEE , HE IS A PROTECTED PENGUIN.. &nbsp;THOUGH 99.9% &nbsp;OF ALL HOMOSEXUALS ARE PEDOPHILES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; CHANDRABABU AND MOMOTO..<br />\n<br />\nAS PER WIKIPEDIA THE PRESIDENT AND STATE GOVERNOR ARE MERE RUBBERS STAMPS. .<br />\n<br />\nSORRY , BOTH PRESIDENT AND GOVERNOR HAVE ENORMOUS SUBJECTIVE DISCRETIONARY POWERS..<br />\n<br />\nSection 6 of the Delhi Special Police Establishment Act, 1946 states:-<br />\n<br />\n\u201cConsent of State Government to exercise of powers and jurisdiction \u2013 Nothing contained in section 5 shall be deemed to enable any member of the Delhi Special Police Establishment to exercise powers and jurisdiction in any area in a State, not being a Union territory or railway area], without the consent of the Government of that State.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IF CHANDRABABU NAIDU OR MAMATA BANNERJEE IS GUILT OF EMBEZZLEMENT OR BRIBERY CBI WILL MAKE THEM EAT CROW..&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<br />\nCBI CAN EVEN ARREST ANY SENIOR ARMY OFFICERS ON CHARGES OF CORRUPTION..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">CBI DOES NOT INTERFERE IN STATE AFFAIRS --THE MAIN REASON BEING DUPLICATION OF WORK..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">The inadequacy of the state police to deal with CORRUPTION of CM and his ministers is apparent. This is why a govt has to fall before bribery/ corruption charges can be leveled against a CM or his coterie ministers.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: red;\">THE STATE CANNOT PREVENT OR BAR CBI FROM ENTERING THE STATE \u2013IT IS UNCONSTITUTONAL .. THE SUPREME COURT HAS NO POWERS TO HARNESS THE CBI..&nbsp;</b></div>\n<br />\nCBI CAN INVESTIGATE ANY CENTRAL GOVT OFFICE IN ANY STATE.<br />\n<br />\nCBI CAN INVESTIGATE ANY CASE IN THE STATE WHERE FINANCIAL INTERESTS OF THE CENTRAL GOVT IS INVOLVED.<br />\n<br />\nCBI CAN INVESTIGATE ANY CASE IN THE STATE RELATING TO BREACH OF CENTRAL LAWS.. LET MOMOTO BONERJEE TRY SPONSORING ROHINGYAS OR BANGLADESIS TO BUTTRESS HER MUSLIM VOTE BANK\u2014KARKE DEKH DIDI !<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">CBI CAN INVESTIGATE CASES HAVING INTERSTATE AND INTERNATIONAL RAMIFICATIONS OR WHERE INTERNAL / EXTERNAL SECURITY OF THE NATION IS AT STAKE..&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<br />\nCBI JUST NEEDS TO INFORM THE STATE GOVT OUT OF COURTESY ( ONLY IF THEY WANT )<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE ASK THE CENTRE TO AMEND THE DELHI POLICE ACT , OR ISSUE AN ORDINANCE ASAP..</span></b></div>\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCM CHANDRABABU NAIDU<br />\nGOVERNOR OF ANDHRA<br />\nCM MOMOTO BONERJEE'<br />\nCM OF WEST BENGAL<br />\nPMO<br />\nP MODI<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nHOME MINISTER<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nCBI<br />\nIB<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nALL SUPERME COURT JUDGES<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT LAWYERS<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nHOME MINISTRIES OF ALL STATES<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nFALI BAY<br />\nSOLI BABY<br />\nSALVE BABY</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; THERE IS NO INTELLIGENCE IN THIS..<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA THE SHORTEST ROUTE IS NEVER THE FASTEST ROUTE... NOBODY CAN ASK THE CAPTAIN WHY HE CHOSE A LONGER ROUTE.. THE SHIP CAPTAIN IS EMPOWERED BY LAW TO USE HIS \"SUBJECTIVE\" DISCRETION..<br />\n<br />\nABANDON SHIP CAN BE ANNOUNCED BY ONLY ONE MAN-- AND IT IS A SUBJECTIVE DECISION.. LIVES ARE INVOLVED ..<br />\n<br />\nSO STOP THIS RIDICULOUS \"OBJECTIVE \" JUDICIAL REVIEW..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/the-indian-constitution-does-not-allow.html<br />\n<br />\nPILs BY FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs USING LAWYERS LIKE PRASHANT BHUSHAN , OFTEN HAVE ZERO EVIDENCE.. ALL THEY ARE ALLOWED TO DO IS TO INTERPRET EXISTING LAWS \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nIN OUR CASE THE JUDICIARY IS A COLLEGIUM SYSTEM\u2014 WHICH MEANS JUDGES ELECT JUDGES.. THIS IS NOT ALLOWED BY OUR CONSTITUTION. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS THE ONLY NATION ON THE PLANET WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES .. TRAMPLING ON THE WILL OF \"WE THE PEOPLE\" IN A DEMOCRACY \u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe Supreme Court is itself bound by the Constitution of India and the Parliament can amend the Constitution any time they want.. The Melords don\u2019t realize this\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe time has come for the Supreme Court to introspect on whether the use of Article 142 as an independent source of power should be regulated by strict guidelines\u2014if the Melords DRUNK WITH POWER do not then the govt must strike it down with an ordinance..<br />\n<br />\nARTICLE 141 GIVES THE ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY UNBRIDLED DISCRETIONARY POWER WITHOUT ANY ACCOUNTABILITY WHATSOEVER\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIn a landmark ruling on 11 January 2007, the Supreme Court of India ruled that all laws (including those in the Ninth Schedule) would be open to Judicial Review if they violated the basic structure of the constitution. ..<br />\n<br />\nSorry, this ruling is NULL AND VOID.. Supreme court has NO such powers\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE ASK THE MODI GOVT TO BRING AN ORDINANCE TO OVERTUN THE SUPREME COURT VERDICT..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 32: Allows any AGGRIEVED person to knock on the doors of the Supreme Court in case of (what according to him is) a violation of Fundamental Rights\u2026<br />\n<br />\nEmpowers the SC to issue Writs to enforce such person's Fundamental Rights, if such a violation has indeed taken place\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIN THE CASE OF SABARIMALA THE PIL WAS FILED BY A CRYPTO JEW MUSLIM NAMED NAUSHAD KHAN.. HE WAS NOT AN AGGRIEVED PERSON.. KHAN BABY SHOULD HAVE WORRIED ABOUT MUSLIM WOMEN NOT BEING ALLOWED IN SUNNI MOSQUES\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE MODI GOVT TO PASS A LAW CREATING STRICT GUIDELINES FOR JUDICIARY TO ENTERTAIN PILs.. ..<br />\n<br />\nNO JUDGE CAN GO BEYOND THE CONSTITUTION.. ALL JUDGES CAN DO IS TO INTERPRET LAWS.. JUDGES CANNOT STRIKE DOWN OR CREATE ANY LAWS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE CONSTITUTION IS A DYNAMIC DOCUMENT.. TERRIFIC INNUENDO..<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE?<br />\n<br />\nTODAY , 4TH OCT 2018, AT 0745 , HE WAS LEADING A DISCUSSION ABOUT AYYAPPA..<br />\n<br />\nTHEN HE SAYS AYYAPPA ( VISHNUs NINTH AVATAR ) IS NASTIKA BRAHMACHARI-- BUT CAN WE EVER CONSIDER KRISHNA ( VISHNUs EIGHT AVATAR ) TO BE A SIMILAR NASTIKA BRAHMACHARI-- WITH A SARCASTIC SMILE , ELUCIDATING A SIMILAR SARCASTIC RESPONESE FROM THE PARTICIPANTS ON STAGE AND THE LEANINGS BASED SELECTED AUDIENCE ..<br />\n<br />\nI MUST TELL THIS TO CULTURAL TERRORIST JOHN BRITTAS..<br />\n<br />\nKRISHNAs MISTRESS RADHA NEVER EXISTED.. WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OF RADHA TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nKALIDAS WHO WROTE ABOUT RADHA NEVER EXISTED.. NOT A SINGE DASA OF THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT EXISTED ..BHAKTI MVOVEMENT NEVER EXISTED.. HINDUS DO SHRADDHA , NOT BHAKTI..<br />\n<br />\nTHE CHRISTIANS AND ATHEISTS AND ZAKIR NAIK MADE A GREAT DEAL OF KRISHNA BEING A WOMANISER.. THAT HE WAS FROLICKING WITH 16000 VIRGIN GOPIKA DAMSELS, WHOM HE DEFLOWERED....<br />\n<br />\nDEVDUTT PATTANAIK HAS BEEN REGULARLY DENIGRATING KRISHNA-- THE LAST I HEARD HIM TELLING ON EPIC TV THAT KRISHNA WAS A CROSS DRESSER AND HE USED TO EXCHANGE CLOTHES WITH RADHA ..<br />\n<br />\nHULLO EX-JNU STUDENT COMMIE JOHN BRITTAS... YOUR MIND IS SO SHALLOW AND FULL OF POISON-- YET, TRY ND UNDERSTAND THIS..WE KNOW YOU DONT HAVE THE BALLS TO INSULT ISLAM..<br />\n<br />\n16000 GOPIKAS ALLUDE TO THE 16000 DHATUS OF SAHASRARA CHAKRA WHICH IS A 1000 PETALLED LOTUS IN FULL BLOOM ..EACH PETAL WITH 16 KALAS ( ASPECTS ) ...<br />\n<br />\nNARAKASURA KIDNAPPED 16000 GOPIKAS WHOM KRISHNA SAVED --THIS IS JUST AN ALLEGORY..<br />\n<br />\nIN SANATANA DHARMA ALL GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES ,, EXCEPT VISHNU AVATARS RAMA, KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY DESH DROHI LITERARY FEST --HAD ATHEIST COMMIES AND WHITE CHRISTIANS SINGING PRAISES OF KRISHNAs MISTRESS RADHA AND HER BOLD SEXUALITY ..<br />\n<br />\nJAYADEVA WHO INVENTED RADHA NEVER EXISTED. HE WAS A FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATION OF JEW ROTHSCHILD.<br />\n<br />\nOdissi dance was created by the white invader to propagate the FAKE Radha. Jayadeva's ashtapadis are sung in dance performances of Odissi. Oriya bhajans are all ragas and talas specified by COOKED UP Jayadeva's hymns.<br />\n<br />\nTHE FAKE MUTTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD SPREAD THE FAKE WORK OF JAYADEVA \"GITA GOVINDA \" PACKED WITH KRISHNA RADHA EROTICA AND SEX ..<br />\n<br />\nAMITABH BACHCHAN PROPAGATES LIES ON TV SHOW KBC-- THAT BUDDHA IS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU, THAT JAYADEVA IS THE COURT POET OF KING LAKSHMANASENA OF BENGAL GETTING ORIYAS HOPPING MAD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HINDU HATING ITALIAN WAITRESS RELEASED STAMPS OF JAYADEVA IN 2009.. SHE DOES NOT KNOW THAT THE GLORY OR ANCIENT ROME IS HINDU.. THAT JESUS WAS COOKED UP BY THE ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTINE THE GREAT IN 325 AD AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA .<br />\n<br />\nJESUS WAS MODELED AFTER A KERALA SAGE NAMED APOLLONIUS OF TYANA.. ALL CAESARS AND ROMANS SENATORS WERE HINDU..<br />\n<br />\nEPIC MAHABHARATA HAS NEVER MENTIONED RADHA..<br />\n<br />\nSABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE , THIS PLANETs LARGEST , HAS BEEN GOING ON FOR 5900 YEARS ..<br />\n<br />\nHEY COMMIE JOHN BRITTAS -- IF YOU WANT TO KNOW HINDUISM READ THE 114 PART BLOG SERIES BELOW..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_45BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
