On the\none hand there is the pent up potentiality for bursting forth residing in the\nsphota itself, while on the other hand there is the desire of the speaker to\ncommunicate Bharthari finds language to contain and reveal its own telos..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body of human\nbeings is&nbsp; most suitable for the\nmanifestation of Nada&nbsp; .(\u2018tatra\nnadopayogitvat&nbsp; manusam dehamucyate\u2019) &nbsp;The \u2018voice\u2019 (svara), which the human&nbsp; body utters, is described as \u2018Sarira\u2019 by\nBharata. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The larynx in the case\nof man&nbsp; is larger while vocal chords are\nthicker and bigger than in the case of&nbsp; a\nwoman and children. The pitch of the note produced by a man is lower than that\nof the note produced by a woman or a child. Thus, \u2018sarira\u2019 represents the\n\u2018innate voice\u2019 of a person. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Man is also capable of&nbsp; producing different kinds of voices in\ndifferent occasions. Thus, the&nbsp; nature\nofthe production ofthe voice varies according to the intended&nbsp; applications.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For instance, when a person\nwants to call a man standing&nbsp; at some\nconsiderable distance, he has to increase the loudness and&nbsp; intensity of his voice (so as to shout\nlouder); and this kind of voice is&nbsp; not\nrequired to talk to a person by his side. Thus, voice is produced&nbsp; differently for different applications.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By regulating the\nbreath and the vibrations caused at vocal&nbsp;\nchords man is capable of producing different kinds of voices by suitably\nmodifying or modulating such a mixture of those two in vocal organs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is that\n\u2018sound-breath-mixture\u2019emitted&nbsp; by the\nlarynx (vocal chord), the musicologists called \u2018dhatu\u2019, and&nbsp; Pratisakhyas as \u2018dravya\u2019. It is called\n\u2018dhvani\u2019 in common parlance. now proceed to consider the \u2018Vocal applications of\nNada\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are, mainly, four\nkinds ofvocal applications of Nada:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A) Linguistic\nApplications<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">B) Musical Applications<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">C) Aesthetic\nApplications and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">D) Spiritual\nApplications.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sound that causes\ndifferent linguistic syllables or musical&nbsp;\n\u2018svaras\u2019 is nothing but \u2018sounding breath\u2019, and this \u2018sounding breath\u2019,&nbsp; is called \u2018dhvani\u2019 in Sanskrt. In other\nwords, the vibrations caused by&nbsp; breath\nin vocal chords, emerging together out of the mouth is&nbsp; dhvani\u2019.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The total mass of sound emitted from\nthroat, while taking&nbsp; different syllables\nor musical svaras, takes different volume and&nbsp;\ndifferent qualities- some times more \u2018hard\u2019, some times more \u2018soft\u2019,&nbsp; some times more volume, some times less\nvolume, as per the need.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This kind of variations\nof sound-breath material in volume and&nbsp; intensity\nis called \u2018samyoga pinda\u2019.&nbsp; There are\nthree kinds of such \u2018samyoga pindas\u2019 : Ayahpinda (hard&nbsp; like iron eg. \u2018agnih\u2019, \u2018tanacmi\u2019, \u2018yakkna\u2019\netc. 2) Darupinda (hard&nbsp; like wood), eg.\n\u2018assvah\u2019, \u2018suryyah\u2019, 3) Urnapinda ( soft like wool), e.g. \u2018ksnah\u2019, \u2018asmmin\u2019\netc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/GUBZ36RQ2X4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/GUBZ36RQ2X4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sphota is the\nperfect gist of language and is the cornerstone of all linguistic process.\nBhartrhari is the founder of sphotavada. &nbsp;&nbsp;Sphota is the original Sound produced by\nvarious vocal organs with the contact of various places of articulation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/SPuCNzapsQ0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/SPuCNzapsQ0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018Bhartrhari\u2019 was also\nknown as \u201cPadavakyapramanajna\u201d. Through his famous work Vakyapadiya,\nBhartrharidepicts his deep knowledge of the central problems of semantics.\n\u2018Trikandi\u2019 is another name of Vakyapadiya, i.e. that which has three kandas-\u2018Brahmakanda\u2019\nor \u2018Agamakanda\u2019, \u2018Vakyakanda\u2019 and \u2018Prakirnakanda\u2019.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/IN4aR_0H4TY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/IN4aR_0H4TY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The metaphysical\nbackgrounds of the Sphota doctrine are discussed in the beginning chapter\n\u2018Agamakanda\u2019. \u2018Vakyakanda\u2019 deals with the fundamental&nbsp; Subject of semantics in general linguistics\nand figures out it on the basis of Sphota doctrine. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/RHyMTMUHe14/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/RHyMTMUHe14?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The last chapter deals with\nthe concept of the Ultimate essence \u2013\u2018akhandavakyasphota\u2019. The output of sound\n(sabdavirbhava), comprehension (grahana), and communication (vinimaya) are the\nconcepts that revolutionized by Bhartrhari. His&nbsp;\nanalytical study surfaced the way for the rational doctrine namely\n\u2018Sphotavada\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/myvHBZzl0Jw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/myvHBZzl0Jw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Na so\u2019sti pratyayo loke\nyah&nbsp; s\u2019abda:nugama:d rte,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">anuviddham iva jna:nan\nsarvam s\u2019abdena bha:s\u2019ate.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><b>Vakyapadidya I, 123</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThere is no cognition\nwithout the operation of the word. Shot through and through is cognition by the\nword, as it were. All knowledge is illuminated by the word.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"https://cudl.lib.cam.ac.uk/view/MS-ADD-00876/8\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"></span></a></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><a href=\"https://cudl.lib.cam.ac.uk/view/MS-ADD-00876/8\">https://cudl.lib.cam.ac.uk/view/MS-ADD-00876/8</a></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/qZsdAXF9DTE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/qZsdAXF9DTE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Below:&nbsp; Italian Fibonacci stole an Arabian\ntranslation from Sanskrit&nbsp; of the great\nIndian Mathematician Pingala's Matra Meru ( written in 500 BC ) , from Bejaya\nAlgeria and patented it in his name.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/perfect-six-pack-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/perfect-six-pack-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/YV_tu2Ucby4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/YV_tu2Ucby4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The uttered\nsound-energy (the vaikhari mode of language) is picked up by the ears (sense\norgans) of the listener/learner and becomes sentence in the madhyama mode- the\nmodulated virtual mental energy form mode in conjugation with the inner mental\ntools.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This sentence-energy form in madhyama mode is in subject-verb-object\n(the triad-triputi) form. This mode of language gets demodulated (reverse\ntransformation of maya - the becoming in the reverse direction) into meaning,\nresulting in understanding/experience in the pasyanti mode- to a verb (sense),\nin present continuous or infinite form, the subject and object being dissolved\nin the sense of uttered /expressed sound.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This, when meaningfully experienced\nin the awareness of para mode, is the purport or import of the uttered word-\nBliss, Being, Peace or Unoccupied Awareness , the normal or natural state of\nmind - i.e, the state of Self, Atman or Brahman. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus psychic energy\n(virtual mental energy reflection) pulses, being issued out by Atman\n[Sat-Chit-Ananda (Being-Pure Consciousness-Bliss)] and after getting reflected\nin the medha, (medulla oblongata ) as virtual or chit- energy (virtual mental\nenergy reflection) pulses, first get modulated from this para / rasa / purport\nmode by cognizing stored energies in potential (jada) form\u2013in the form of\nsubject-object- free verbs/senses, experiences, intuitions, understandings,\nurges, volitions through the inner mental tool chittam to be transformed in to\nthe mode of verb, mood, experience-pasyanti.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It then again gets transformed into\nsentence -subject-verb-object state, the madhyama mode - by simultaneously\ncognizing the object energy-forms \u2013 stored as potential energy (jada) forms \u2013\nas inner mental world through the inner mental tool, manas in the awareness of\nwithin \u2013- as feelings or thoughts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is an inter-link\nbetween sound and sphota, as soon as the speaker produces the sound through the\narticulatory organs, the sphota is revealed. But the listener cannot understand\nsphota immediately.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each sound unit\ncontributes some thing to the total perception of sphota. The listener receives\nthe phonemes in a sequence and grasps the form of a word in his mind, when the\nlast phoneme is heard. The last sound helps the listener to recognize the sphota\nabsolutely. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This entire process of\nmanifesting sphota is compared with the act of painting. Just as an artist\nreproduces his mental &nbsp;idea of the form\nof an object on a cloth, similarly the speaker reproduces the mental verbal image\nof a word through articulated phonemes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhartrihari&nbsp;&nbsp; is projected as a grammarian by the white\nhistorians . If you understand his works , he is a philosopher first and then a\ngrammarian.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He establishes amazing connections between grammar, logic,\nsemantics, and ontology.&nbsp;&nbsp; His thought\nmay be characterized as part of the shabdadvaita (word monistic) school of\nthought, which asserts that cognition and language at an ultimate level are\nontologically identical concepts that refer to one supreme reality, Brahman.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhartrihari interprets the notion of the originary word (shabda) as\ntranscending the bounds of spoken and written language and meaning. Understood\nas shabda tattva-the \"word principle,\" this complex idea explains the\nnature of consciousness, the awareness of all forms of phenomenal appearances,\nand posits an identity obtains between these, which is none other than Brahman.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is thus language as a fundamentally ontological principle that accounts for\nhow we are able to conceptualize and communicate the awareness of objects. The\nmetaphysical notion of shabda Brahman posits the unity of all existence as the\nfoundation for all linguistically designated individual phenomena.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first two chapters\nof the Bhartrhari\u2019s Vakyapad\u00eeya discuss the nature of creation, the\nrelationship of Brahman, world, language, the individual soul (jiva), and the\nmanifestation and comprehension of the meanings of words and sentences. In\nancient India, grammarians saw their task as establishing the foundations of\nthe Vedas, but their work often resulted in the development of profound\nphilosophical systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patanjali, in his\nMahabhashya, explains that the study of grammar (vyaaranam) was meant to\nmaintain the truth of the Vedas, to guide the use of Vedic speech in ritual\ncontexts, and to aid in the clear interpretations of individual human speech.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Panini and Patanjali, two major Sanksrit grammarians, were the first to\nprovide a systematic and formal analysis of the grammatical bases of all\nintended meanings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panini&nbsp; developed the Ashtadhyaya (Eight-Chapters)\nfor the grammarians. This impressive work contains a thorough analysis of the\nrules of Sanskrit language down into its nominal and verbal components; it\ncontains a science of language, applicable to the Vedas, also comprised of sets\nof operational rules and meta -rules that interpret the former.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among these\n\"rules for interpretation\" of Vedic texts, we are given a \u201cuniversal\ngrammar. Panini deals with spoken and Vedic languages as if they are of the\nsame genre.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Panini's ( 5500 BC )</span>\n</span></b>Ashtadhyayi, its commentaries, and the Vakyapadiya of <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">Bhartrihari ( 7000\nBC)&nbsp;</span></b> </span>constitute the fundamental texts for\nthe school of Panini\u2019s grammar.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">Patanjali\n( 5000 BC )</span></b> </span>wrote the Mahabhashya, an interpretation of some of P\u00e2nini\u2019s rules\nwritten in dialogue form, and it is this work that is the basis for later\ncommentaries on grammar and philosophy. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The Dharmash\u00e2stras or\nTreatises on Law, including the well-known Laws of <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Manu ( 8300 BC )</b></span></span> , were\ncomposed much before .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/manu-first-law-maker-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/manu-first-law-maker-capt-ajit.html</a></span><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 36.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>SPOT THE TWAT CONTEST</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/hNwPD0I5Tms/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/hNwPD0I5Tms?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; TELL THEM APUN KA MANN MANDIR MEIN DOUBT AAH GAYA.</span>.<br />\n<br />\nGIVE ME A FEEDBACK ABOUT THE BROWN SAHIBS AND MEMSAHIBS YOU SEND IT TO -- WHO WEAR WESTERN DRESS , APE THE WHITE FOLKS -- YET STINK OF PICKLE AND CHUTNEY ..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_22TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_21B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c711068404496389897\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_21M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_27.html?showComment=1540704814872#c711068404496389897\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 28, 2018 at 11:03 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_21MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WANT ALL MY THIYYA / EZHAVA KERALA READERS TO LISTEN UP..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIYYA ARE NOT EZHAVAS...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN ANCIENT DAYS ( MILLENNIUMS BEFORE PARASHURAMA OF 4000 BC ) KERALA POPULATION WAS DIVIDED INTO TWO GROUPS THIRAYYARS AND MALAYYARS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIRAYYARS WERE THE RULING CLASS, THE WARRIOR CLASS, THE ELITE INTELLECTUALS AND SEA NAVIGATORS.. THEY OCCUPIED COASTAL AREAS AND NORTH OF KERALA. . THIS CLASS PRODUCED THE PHAROAHS OF EGYPT.. THESE ARE THE THIYYAS OF TODAY..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MALAYYARS WERE THE AGRICULTURAL CLASS, THE TRIBALS, THE UNSKILLED WORKERS.. THEY OCCUPIED THE MOUNTAIN AREAS, OF KERALA AND THE NORTH PART OF SRI LANKA..THESE ARE THE EZHAVAS OF TODAY..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE NAMBOODRIS WERE THE SANSKRIT AND ORAL VEDAS KNOWING CREAM OF THE THIYYAS.. THEY WERE VISITING PROFESSORS , ALL OVER THE PLANET.. YOU COULD SPOT A NAMBOODIRI FROM FAR AS HE HAD A STRANGE HAIR STYLE.. NAMBOODIRIS WERE HELD IN AWE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED A CRYPTO JEW CLAN CALLED VARMAS ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE FINE DAY VARMAS TOOK OVER A RULERS OF KERALA ( JUST LIKE PESHWAS CHITPAVAN JEWS DISPLACED MAHAR SHIVAJI RULING CLAN ) .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD THEN DEMOTED THIYYAS TO COCONUT TREE TODDY TAPPER MONKEYS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN ANCIENT DAYS WE TRAINED MONKEYS TO TAP TODDY AND PLUCK MANGOES , AND THESE TRAINED MONKEYS FROM PUNT ( MALABAR ) WERE IN GREAT DEMAND IN EGYPT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIYYAS WERE THE TORCH BEARERS OF THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION WHICH PRECEDED THE VEDIC CIVILIZATION BY SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE FATHER OF KERALA KING MAHABALI, VIROCHANA RULED THE WHOLE PLANET..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MAHABALI WAS BANISHED BY VISNUs VAMANA AVATAR TO PATALA ( PERU )..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD THEN MERGED THIYYAS WITH EZHAVAS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY ALL MARRIAGE BUREAUS CLUB THIYYAS AND EZHAVAS TOGETHER.. NO THIYYA WILL EVER GIVE HIS DAUGHTER OR SON TO AN EZHAVA.. EZHAVAS ARE BLUNT FACED..</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD PROPPED UP AN EZHAVA SAINT NAMED SRI NARAYANA GURU ..AND HIS MEDIA MADE HIM FAMOUS..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD THEN CREATED A SOCIO-POLITICAL ORGANISATION NAMED SNDP ( SRI DHARMA PARIPALANA YOGAM ) LEAD BY TRAITOR STOOGES....</span>&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">ROTHSCHILD THEN ALLOWED SNDP QUICK WINS ( LIKE HOW HE ALLOWED KATHIAWARI JAIN-JEW MK GANDHI QUICK WINS IN SOUTH AFRICA ) --TO SHOW THAT SNDP IS A VERY POWERFUL ORG..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AFTER A WHILE SRI NARAYANA GURU WHO WAS NOT STUPID CAUGHT ON AND LEFT SNDP-- HE SAID HE IS NOT PART OF THIS TRAITOR ORG ANY MORE..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVEN TODAY IF POOR THIYYAS WANT TO GET MARRIED IN SNDP MARRIAGE HALL IN CALICUT, THE HUGE PHOTO OF SRI NARAYANA GURU IS KEPT NEXT TO THE LAMP AND THE COUPE HAVE TO GO AROUND THIS PHOTO..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SORRY IN SANATANA DHARMA WE ARE NOT ALLOWED TO GIVE ANY MORTAL SUCH HONOUR..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY SNDP IS LED BY A UGLY BLUNT FACED FELLOW NAMED VELLAPALLY NATESHAN..&nbsp;</span></span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-weight: bold;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-weight: bold;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE THING TO NOTE IS THAT HIS FACE IS A TAMIL DALITs FACE OF THE ANCIENT PANDYA KINGDOM ( WHICH ALSO RULED SRI LANKA ) .. HIS NAME NATESAN IS NOT A KERALA NAME..</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-weight: bold;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">VELLAPALLY NATESAN ( A STOOGE OF DEEP STATE FOREIGN FORCES ) IS ON THE SIDE OF COMMIE ATHEIST CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN OVER THE SABARIMALA ISSUE.. THIS FELLOW IS NOBODY TO DECIDE FOR THE THIYYAS / EZHAVAS..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHECK OUT THIS UGLY FELLOWs FACE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vellapally_Natesan</span><br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">VELLAPALLY NATESAN IS THE REASON WHY EZHAVAS AND THIYYAS VOTE FOR ATHEIST COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYAN... HE IS A STOOGE OF COMMIES.. JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED COMMUNISM..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://www.newindianexpress.com/states/kerala/2017/sep/20/bdjs-exit-from-nda-vellappally-natesan-holds-talks-with-kerala-cm-pinarayi-1659776.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I ASK MY MALAYALI READERS TO SPREAD THIS COMMENT.. DO NOT ACCEPT ANY DIKTATS FROM THIS TRAITOR WHO IS NOT EVEN A MALAYALI..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Today, as the final verses are being sung, all the assistant Santhis (priests) leave the Sreekovil one by one. As the song ends, only the Melsanthi is inside. He extinguishes the lamps one at a time and closes the doors for the night.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; As the song ends, only the Melsanthi is inside. He\nextinguishes the lamps one at a time and closes the doors for the night.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/UyCW91AhqNQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/UyCW91AhqNQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">BELOW:&nbsp; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_27.html?showComment=1540704814872#c711068404496389897\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 28, 2018 at 11:03 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_21MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WANT ALL MY THIYYA / EZHAVA KERALA READERS TO LISTEN UP..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIYYA ARE NOT EZHAVAS...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN ANCIENT DAYS ( MILLENNIUMS BEFORE PARASHURAMA OF 4000 BC ) KERALA POPULATION WAS DIVIDED INTO TWO GROUPS THIRAYYARS AND MALAYYARS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIRAYYARS WERE THE RULING CLASS, THE WARRIOR CLASS, THE ELITE INTELLECTUALS AND SEA NAVIGATORS.. THEY OCCUPIED COASTAL AREAS AND NORTH OF KERALA. . THIS CLASS PRODUCED THE PHAROAHS OF EGYPT.. THESE ARE THE THIYYAS OF TODAY..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MALAYYARS WERE THE AGRICULTURAL CLASS, THE TRIBALS, THE UNSKILLED WORKERS.. THEY OCCUPIED THE MOUNTAIN AREAS, OF KERALA AND THE NORTH PART OF SRI LANKA..THESE ARE THE EZHAVAS OF TODAY..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE NAMBOODRIS WERE THE SANSKRIT AND ORAL VEDAS KNOWING CREAM OF THE THIYYAS.. THEY WERE VISITING PROFESSORS , ALL OVER THE PLANET.. YOU COULD SPOT A NAMBOODIRI FROM FAR AS HE HAD A STRANGE HAIR STYLE.. NAMBOODIRIS WERE HELD IN AWE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED A CRYPTO JEW CLAN CALLED VARMAS ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE FINE DAY VARMAS TOOK OVER A RULERS OF KERALA ( JUST LIKE PESHWAS CHITPAVAN JEWS DISPLACED MAHAR SHIVAJI RULING CLAN ) .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD THEN DEMOTED THIYYAS TO COCONUT TREE TODDY TAPPER MONKEYS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN ANCIENT DAYS WE TRAINED MONKEYS TO TAP TODDY AND PLUCK MANGOES , AND THESE TRAINED MONKEYS FROM PUNT ( MALABAR ) WERE IN GREAT DEMAND IN EGYPT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIYYAS WERE THE TORCH BEARERS OF THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION WHICH PRECEDED THE VEDIC CIVILIZATION BY SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE FATHER OF KERALA KING MAHABALI, VIROCHANA RULED THE WHOLE PLANET..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MAHABALI WAS BANISHED BY VISNUs VAMANA AVATAR TO PATALA ( PERU )..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD THEN MERGED THIYYAS WITH EZHAVAS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY ALL MARRIAGE BUREAUS CLUB THIYYAS AND EZHAVAS TOGETHER.. NO THIYYA WILL EVER GIVE HIS DAUGHTER OR SON TO AN EZHAVA.. EZHAVAS ARE BLUNT FACED..</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD PROPPED UP AN EZHAVA SAINT NAMED SRI NARAYANA GURU ..AND HIS MEDIA MADE HIM FAMOUS..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD THEN CREATED A SOCIO-POLITICAL ORGANISATION NAMED SNDP ( SRI DHARMA PARIPALANA YOGAM ) LEAD BY TRAITOR STOOGES....</span>&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">ROTHSCHILD THEN ALLOWED SNDP QUICK WINS ( LIKE HOW HE ALLOWED KATHIAWARI JAIN-JEW MK GANDHI QUICK WINS IN SOUTH AFRICA ) --TO SHOW THAT SNDP IS A VERY POWERFUL ORG..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AFTER A WHILE SRI NARAYANA GURU WHO WAS NOT STUPID CAUGHT ON AND LEFT SNDP-- HE SAID HE IS NOT PART OF THIS TRAITOR ORG ANY MORE..</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVEN TODAY IF POOR THIYYAS WANT TO GET MARRIED IN SNDP MARRIAGE HALL IN CALICUT, THE HUGE PHOTO OF SRI NARAYANA GURU IS KEPT NEXT TO THE LAMP AND THE COUPE HAVE TO GO AROUND THIS PHOTO..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SORRY IN SANATANA DHARMA WE ARE NOT ALLOWED TO GIVE ANY MORTAL SUCH HONOUR..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY SNDP IS LED BY A UGLY BLUNT FACED FELLOW NAMED VELLAPALLY NATESHAN..&nbsp;</span></span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; HIS NAME NATESAN IS NOT A KERALA NAME..</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">VELLAPALLY NATESAN ( A STOOGE OF DEEP STATE FOREIGN FORCES ) IS ON THE SIDE OF COMMIE ATHEIST CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN OVER THE SABARIMALA ISSUE.. THIS FELLOW IS NOBODY TO DECIDE FOR THE THIYYAS / EZHAVAS..</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHECK OUT THIS UGLY FELLOWs FACE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vellapally_Natesan</span><br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">VELLAPALLY NATESAN IS THE REASON WHY EZHAVAS AND THIYYAS VOTE FOR ATHEIST COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYAN... Every choice made at this wedding by you both will go down in history, not just because it was your wedding but because this incredible wedding stood for CHANGE AND HOPE. Both things that the world needs desperately. Thank you for being the perfect picture of all things good.. seeing your union and love blessed in front of my eyes Made me so happy.. and EAR UP! \ud83d\ude11 I wish you both love happiness and togetherness always.. \ud83d\udc95\"<br />\n<br />\nHEY PRIYANKA BABY --- WHICH ORIFICE DID YOU \"TEAR UP\" FROM, AFTER \"TIME STOOD TILL\" AMIDST \"CHANGE AND HOPE\"?<br />\n<br />\nTEEE HEEEEEEEEEEEEE !<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/heart-shaped-pendant-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_32b+seedB9xbD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_32b+seedB9xbD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_5TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_4B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7068500842568170032\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_4M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. HER SHABBY ACTIVIST BEHAVIOR IS ON RECORD ON VIDEOS..<br />\n<br />\nWILL YOUR SISTER , MOTHER OR MY WIFE BEHAVE THIS WAY ?<br />\n<br />\n99.8% OF PILGRIMS ARRESTED BY ATHEIST COMMIE CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN HAVE BEEN SLAPPED WITH FALSE IPC SECTIONS AND JAILED.. AN EXAMPLE IS THE IPC SECTIONS SLAMMED ON RAHUL EASHWAR..<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE KERALA HIGH COURT-- FOR EVERY DAY SPENT IN JAIL ON FALSE CHARGES , THE COMMIE GOVT OF CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN MUST PAY COMPENSATION OF RUPEES 5 LAKHS TO EVERY PILGRIM..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.thenewsminute.com/article/woman-who-tried-enter-sabarimala-move-sc-against-those-calling-her-maoist-90697</span><br />\nMOST OF THE KERALA DALIT WOMEN CHRISTIAN CONVERTS RETAIN THEIR HINDU NAMES BECAUSE THE CHURCH INSISTS -- THIS IS NO BIG DEAL..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nJANAM TV<br />\nRAHUL EASHWAR<br />\nPADMA PILLAI<br />\nPARASARAN<br />\nCJI GOGOI<br />\nKERALA HIGH COURT CHIEF JUSTICE<br />\nNCW MAIN<br />\nNCW STATES</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9201315189007232976\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_47M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE HAD THREE MAIDS -- ALL WITH HINDU NAMES</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN I AND MY WIFE GO OUT , WHEN WE COME BACK WE CHECK , THE LAST TV CHANNEL LOGGED ON BY THE MAID ( THEY ARE ALLOWED TO SWITCH ON TV WHEN WE ARE NOT AT HOME)..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE DONT CARE IF THE MAID IS CHRISTIAN OR HINDU-- TRUST IS PARAMOUNT WITH SMALL CHILDREN IN THE HOUSE ..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LONG AGO WE HAD A NAXAL CHRISTIAN CONVERT MAID IN OUR HOME.. MY MOTHER TOOK HER TO THE MARKET IN THE CAR AND SHE SUDDENLY RAN , IN PANIC..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SHE CAME BACK HOME SLINKING BY AUTO RICKSHAW AT NIGHT ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A MONTH LATER WOMENs POLICE SUDDENLY LANDED UP AT HOME AT NOON..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A BURLY FEMALE COP RAN INTO THE KITCHEN AND SLAPPED HER SO HARD SHE FELL DOWN - </span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">EDDI NEE EVIDE ENTA CHEYYUNATHE</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"> ( WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU DOING HER )..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE POLICE TOLD MY MOTHER--GET RID OF HER THIS VERY MINUTE-- SHE IS A DANGEROUS WOMAN WITH MURDER CHARGES ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE MAID WAS SO GOOD LOOKING , THAT MY WIFEs FRIENDS WOULD TELL HER-- YOU HAVE TERRIFIC GUTS KEEPING SUCH A ATTRACTIVE YOUNG WOMAN AS YOUR MAID.&nbsp; &nbsp;SHE VISITED BEAUTY PARLOUR EVERY WEEK-- A VERY DOCILE FEMALE . AND SHE WOULD PUT HER PHOTO IN MARRIAGE BUREAUS WITH HINDU NAME, THOUGH SHE WAS A CHRISTIAN CONVERT , HOLDING BIBLE IN HER HAND DURING OFF HOURS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE DAY <b><span style=\"color: red;\">SHE SLIT HER WRIST WITH A BROKEN GLASS</span></b> --I WAS ON THE SHIP-- MY WIFE DROVE HER TO CALICUT MEDICAL COLLEGE HOSPITAL HER KNEES KNOCKING.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE SURGEON TOLD MY WIFE, IT IS A MIRACLE THAT SHE SURVIVED CONSIDERING THE TIME ELAPSED BETWEEN SLITTING HER WRIST AND GETTING MEDICAL ATTENTION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY WIFE MADE HER SIT IN THE FRONT SEAT, WITH HER HAND HELD HIGH ( BANDAGED ) OUTSIDE THE WINDOW..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY WIFE KNEW THIS WAS COMING-- AS THE PAST WEEK SHE WOULD BE BANGING HER HEAD ON THE WALL HOLDING THE BIBLE..MAKING LOUD DHAD DHAD SOUNDS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LATER WE CAME TO KNOW THAT SHE WAS A MOVIE EXTRA IN THE TAMIL FILM INDUSTRY-- WHERE ALL FROM HERO, TO DIRECTOR TO PRODUCER TOOK HER SEXUALLY FROM ALL THREE ORIFICES --PROMISING HER A MEATY MAIN HEROINE ROLE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_28.html?showComment=1540850278124#c7004906331958947829\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 30, 2018 at 3:27 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_28MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-tops-in-under-5-deaths-due-to-toxic-air-60000-killed-in-2016-who/articleshow/66422048.cms<br />\n<br />\nNANO CARBON KILLS ... NOT VISIBLE CARBON... THE HUMAN BODY CAN HANDLE VISIBLE SMOKE , NOT LPG/ CNG EXHAUST EMISSIONS..NANO CARBONS FROM EXHAUSTS OF CNG AND LPG BREACHES THE BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026. EVER SINCE CNG/ LPG USE INCREASED IN INDIA CHILDREN ARE BEING BORN WITH HOLE IN THE HEART \u2026. HULLO APCO MODI \u2026 LISTEN UP \u2026 AND LISTEN GOOD\u2026\u2026.A WOOD FIRE FOR MAKING A CHAPPATI IN A VILLAGE, WILL NOT CAUSE A HOLE IN THE HEART OF A BABY- .. BECAUSE THIS VISIBLE SMOKE WILL NOT INVADE THE BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER \u2026. CHILDEN ARE BEING BORN AUTISTIC AND WITH BIRTH DEFETCS FALSELY TOUTED AS GENETIC \u2026\u2026\u2026 BREACHING OF BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER BY NANO CARBON CAN CAUSE MYELOMENINGOCELE. \u2026. BEFORE ADVENT OF CNG/ LPG THIS DISEASE WAS UNKNOWN IN INDIA\u2026\u2026\u2026 IN INDIA NEURAL TUBE DEFECTS ARE RARE DUE TO OUR GOTRA SYSTEM\u2026\u2026\u2026.. OUR COLLEGIUM JUDGES ARE PUSHING EVEN VILLAGE WOMEN TO USE LPG CYLINDERS AND PM MODI WANTS TO IMPORT US SHALE GAS FROM HALF WAY AROUND THE PLANET\u2026.. NANO CARBON CAUSES INTERSTITIAL LUNG DISEASE AND SCARRING OF LUNGS \u2026\u2026\u2026 NANO CARBON BY CNG VEHICLE EXHAUST CAUSE MYELIN SHEATH DAMAGE\u2026.<br />\n<br />\ngo0gle for the blogpost below--<br />\n<br />\n..................................... THE CONSTITUTION CANNOT BE USED TO STRAIT-JACKET \"WE THE PEOPLE\"\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nRECENTLY THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY PASSED THREE LAWS BELOW--<br />\nAAA- ADULTERY IS LEGAL..<br />\nBBB- HOMOSEXUALITY IS LEGAL..<br />\nCCC- MENSTRUATING WOMEN CAN ENTER SABARIMALA SANNIDHANAM\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE UNELECTED / UNACCOUNTABLE JUDICIARY CANNOT MAKE OR BREAK LAWS.. ALL THEY ARE ALLOWED TO DO IS TO INTERPRET EXISTING LAWS \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nIN OUR CASE THE JUDICIARY IS A COLLEGIUM SYSTEM\u2014WHICH MEANS JUDGES ELECT JUDGES.. THIS IS NOT ALLOWED BY OUR CONSTITUTION. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS THE ONLY NATION ON THE PLANET WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES .. THIS BREEDS NEPOTISM AND TRAITORS IN DEEP STATE PAYROLL\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nJUDGES CAN ONLY JUDGE FOR A SPECIFIC CASE FOR AN AGGRIEVED INDIVIDUAL OR SMALL GROUP OF LIMITED NUMBERS \u2026 FOR AN AGGRIEVED NATION OF 1300 MILLION PEOPLE WE HAVE AN ELECTED DEMOCRATIC SYSTEM..<br />\n<br />\nLAWYER TURNED JUDGES WHO CANNOT THINK BEYOND THE OBJECTIVE, ARE THE BANE OF INDIAN JUDICIAL SYSTEM\u2026<br />\n<br />\nDHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE ) CAN NEVER BE OBJECTIVE AND GIVEN TO A NON-CONSCIOUS CALCULATOR / COMPUTER , WHICH CAN NEVER TELL THE MORAL OF A STORY , LAUGH AT A SUBTLE JOKE OR UNDERSTAND WHAT IS CULTURE..<br />\n<br />\nWE NEED A SYSTEM WHERE INTELLIGENT JUDGES ( WHO HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO GLEAN CIRCUMSTANTIAL EVIDENCE) ARE SELECTED BY A NATION WIDE ENTRANCE EXAM LIKE IIT...<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE CRITICAL COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCJI GOGOI<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT LAWYERS<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nLAW WE DONT NEED A GUJJU KENYAN TO DICTATE BHARATMATAs FORTUNES AND CRY ABOUT SEC 7 ..<br />\n<br />\nRBI\u2019s autonomy is not sanctioned by statute. RBI does not have the powers to work as per its won whims and fancies.. The RBI can only be as autonomous as the government wants it to be.<br />\n<br />\nIn a democracy, the final responsibility of all policy decisions must lie with Government<br />\n<br />\nSection 7 of RBI act says:<br />\n<br />\n(1) The Central Government may from time to time give such directions to the Bank as it may, after consultation with the Governor of the Bank, consider necessary in the public interest.<br />\n<br />\n(2) Subject to any such directions, the general superintendence and direction of the affairs and business of the Bank shall be entrusted to a Central Board of Directors which may exercise all powers and do all acts and things which may be exercised or done by the Bank.<br />\n<br />\nThe preamble of the Reserve Bank of India describes the basic functions of the reserve bank as:<br />\n<br />\n\"to regulate the issue of Bank notes and keeping of reserves with a view to securing monetary stability in India and generally to operate the currency and credit system of the country to its advantage; to have a modern monetary policy framework to meet the challenge of an increasingly complex economy, to maintain price stability while keeping in mind the objective of growth.\"<br />\n<br />\nRBI LOGO ( TIGER AN PALM TREE ) IS STILL ROTHSCHILDs DOUBLE MOHUR.. THOUGH FORMED IN 1935 AS ROTHSCHILDs BANK, IT WAS NATIONALIZED ONLY IN 1949, WITH ROTHSCHILD STILL CONTROLLING THIS BANK..<br />\n<br />\nThe first Indian to hold the position of the Governor of RBI was Chitpavan JEW C.D. Deshmukh an agent of Jew Rothschild. He was the third governor of RBI.<br />\n<br />\nVK Krishna Menon was least affected by the arm twisting money crunch exerted by Rothschild in India..The process of purging began with easing of Finance Minister CD Deshmukh and replacing him with T.T. Krishnamachari (TTK).<br />\n<br />\nThe Indo-China was made to happen by Jew Rothschild with the sole intention of discrediting VK Menon and eliminating him politically. In December 1961, VK Krishna Menon thwarted Rothschild's designs by making sure that the Portuguese were driven out of Goa.<br />\n<br />\nThis enhanced his reputation further making him a natural successor to Nehru. The arrival of 1962 general elections and VK Krishna Menon\u2019s resounding victory against Acharya JB Kripalani from North Bombay constituency had convinced Rothschild that VK Krishna Menon had to be nipped in the bud.<br />\n<br />\nThe Rothschild controlled press did their best in driving wedges between whoever VK Krishna Menon dealt with. There was this Khadi versus Khaki blitzkrieg, to show CIA favourite Gen Thimayya smelling of roses against VK Krishna Menon.<br />\n<br />\nProbably Zionist encyclopedia , Wikipedia has been kinder to Hitler and Saddam Hussain than VK Krishna Menon. They described him as boorish, vitriolic, intolerant, arrogant, impatient,exigent, evil, Rasputin \u2014but one thing they could not accuse him of was being daft or being a traitor.<br />\n<br />\nWhen VK Krishna Menon resigned there was an unofficial party at the Pentagon. VK Krishna Menon said often \u2013 \u201ccontroversy chases me and I always meet it halfway\u201d pissing off Rothschild..<br />\n<br />\nBeing a visionary , Menon was a driven soul.. He could see things that others do not see , and would immediately march to a different drummer and play by new rules..<br />\n<br />\nVK Krishna Menon believed that those who are not lighting any candles should not bitch about the dark. He did NOT care for consensus from Rothschild's agent and did not have any fear of conflict with Lutyens DEEP STATE babus and traitor Rajya Sabha MPS. ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_15BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/we-people-declare-that-all-laws-created.html?showComment=1541080068409#c7845532721216415418\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 1, 2018 at 7:17 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSNC-Lavalin Kerala hydroelectric scandal is the first ever corruption case against a communist party member -- his name is Pinarayi Vijayan<br />\n<br />\nIt is related to a hydroelectric infrastructure contract between the Indian government and Canadian company SNC-Lavalin in 1995 which resulted in an alleged net loss to the Indian exchequer of 63 billion USD.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.thehindu.com/news/national/kerala/pinarayi-must-face-trial-in-lavalin-case-cbi/article24542681.ece<br />\n<br />\nVS Achutanandan had hinted at Pinarayi\u2019s involvement in the corruption scam in SNC Lavalin case.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2006 and 2011, under pressure from the Pinarayi group, the politburo denied ticket to VS Achutanandan for contesting Assembly elections.However, knuckled under public pressure, the politburo was forced to reverse the decision..<br />\n<br />\nPinarayi and VS were both suspended from the party\u2019s politburo due to infighting<br />\n<br />\nBoth were reinstated later. But VS, who was suspended once again in 2009, never made it to the politburo. The party satraps feared to take stringent action against him because of his immense potential to connect with the masses, though alienated from every party forum by the clever moves of his b\u00eate noire Pinarayi.<br />\n<br />\nPeople had voted for the LDF, not because of its slogan \u201cLDF will come, everything will be alright\u201d, but by the tireless campaign unleashed by VS who led more than 60 rallies across 13 districts in 13 days, travelling about 200 km a day and snatched power from the UDF with 91 seats in the state\u2019s 140 constituencies. Yet, he was sidelined against the wishes of the people.<br />\n<br />\nThe party machinery under Pinarayi\u2019s iron grip, chose his own men to contest the Assembly elections in a big way. When the D-day came, there were only a few in the party to back VS. The strong backing Pinarayi received from Prakash Karat who always stood by the former sealed VS\u2019s fated.<br />\n<br />\nPinarayi hails from Kannur where political killings have become a routine affair. He was an accused in the first political murder of RSS activist Vadickal Ramakrishnan.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.pgurus.com/pinarayi-vijayan-the-prime-accused-in-keralas-first-political-murder/<br />\n<br />\nWithin a span of two years of the Pinarayi Government, Kerala witnessed the ignominious exit of three ministers, EP Jayarajan, AK Saseendran and Thomas Chandy in the light of media expos\u00e9s on them.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN PINARYI VIJAYAN FALLS ( SELF DESTRUCTION ON SABARIMALA ISSUE -- STALIN TYPE REIGN OF TERROR ) MANY COMMUNIST MINISTERS AND THEIR BENAMI MONEY BAGS WHO RUN THEIR BUSINESSES IN GULF WILL BE IN JAIL .. IT IS A WAY TO HEAL YOURSELF MENTALLY..<br />\n<br />\nAre you a hoarder?<br />\n<br />\nThink of all the cloth in your house--inside wardrobes. attics etc. How many of them will you use for the next 3 years. What is the percentage which you have hoarded?<br />\nHoarding is an effort to manage the anxiety raised by obsessive doubts.<br />\n<br />\nHoarders experience intense anxiety when they even think of discarding what most others view as useless objects.<br />\n<br />\nThey are affected by anxiety-provoking thoughts such as: \"What if I run out?\" \"What if I need to know something and don't have the information available?\" \" \"What if I throw it away but the day comes when I really need it?\"<br />\n<br />\nHoarding usually starts in an attic, then in a basement, a spare room, a closet, and then, eventually, takes over every room of the house. As their mounds of useless items continue to climb toward the ceiling, their home is no longer a home.<br />\n<br />\nRoom after room ceases to function. What was once a normal, functional home becomes room after room of trash bins. You look under the bed you will find dust and trash.<br />\n<br />\nStrong emotional connections are formed to the extent that an individual feels a sense of safety or comfort. Hoarders are suspicious of other people touching possessions , as they feel it may be thrown away , when they are not around.<br />\n<br />\nAll hoarders firmly believe that every single object will be useful one day, whether it is a broken toy, old magazine, torn ill fitting shoes, empty container, plastic bag , old tooth brushes, old school notebooks, old damaged music tapes .. They will have an imaginary emotional connection to all such garbage.<br />\n<br />\nFamily members who share a home with the hoarder cannot understand why their loved one keeps so many useless garbage . It prevents the family from enjoying their home.<br />\n<br />\nThe family of the hoarder is ashamed of bringing their friends home. There is no happiness or love.<br />\n<br />\nHoarders make themselves miserable and and everyone else miserable.<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE GO FOR SABARIMALA PIKGRIMAGE, COME BACK--AND GIVE AWAY ( DONATE ) HOARDED STUFF.. OBVIOUSLY SOMETHING GOOD HAS HAPPENED TO HIM, RIGHT ?<br />\n<br />\nPOST MENOPAUSE WOMEN WHO NAG THEIR HUSBANDS HAVE COME BACK FROM SABRIMALA AND STOPPED NAGGING..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/secrets-of-shankh-or-conch-product-of.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadaayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_57TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_56B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9118675891127430929\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_56M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. WHERE THEY TAKE ONLY EXCEPTIONAL BRAINS..<br />\n<br />\nBALLS!<br />\n<br />\nMY ELDER SON HAS REJECTED 100% OF GOOGLE EMPLOYEES WHO SOUGHT A JOB IN HIS COMPANY..<br />\n<br />\nMY SON DID HIS MASTERS IN COMPUTER SCIENCE AT CORNELL.. HE HAS SEVERAL OF HIS CLASSMATES IN GOOGLE ..<br />\n<br />\nMY SON EARNS ALMOST <b><span style=\"color: red;\">DOUBLE</span></b> OF WHAT HIS BATCHMATES GET IN GOOGLE..<br />\n<br />\nHE HAS WHATSUP GROUPS WITH FRIENDS IN ALL TIER ONE COMPANIES .. THAT AMAZON AND APPLEs JOINT WEALTH IS MORE THAN INDIAs GDP..<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nWE ARE NOT FOOLS !!<br />\n<br />\nDIGITIZATION WAS DONE TO NUMBER CRUNCH ULTRA SKILLED FAMILY BASED COTTAGE INDUSTRIES AND TO INCLUDE THEM IN OUR GDP GROWTH STORY..<br />\n<br />\nDuring the Round Table Conferences held in 1931 and 1932, Rothschild insisted on the establishment of a Reserve Bank as a condition for the transfer of power to India.<br />\n<br />\nThe KOSHER bankers also wanted the Indian legislature to have no powers over the bank and Britain to retain the right to appoint the top two positions in the bank. Such extraterritorial controls form the basis of the calls for RBI's complete 'autonomy.<br />\n<br />\nRAGHURAM RAJAN WAS THE QUINTESSENTIAL ROTHSCHILD STOOGE , WHO WANTED ROTHSCHILD TO PROSPER RATHER THAN HIS WATAN..<br />\n<br />\nRBI has imposed curbs on the import of gold thus shoring up the US dollar while depriving Indian citizens the opportunity to seek shelter from inflation. Such curbs do not exist on the people of Europe or the US.<br />\n<br />\nThe creation of a global economic system combined with the 'autonomy' of RBI would only mean that the RBI will be unaccountable to the people of India while it actively works for international powers.<br />\n<br />\nCHITPAVAN JEW Sir Chintaman Dwarakanath Deshmukh, was the first Indian to be appointed as the Governor of the Reserve Bank of India in 1943 by JEW Rothschild.<br />\n<br />\nReserve Bank of India Act, 1934 is the legislative act under which the Reserve Bank of India was formed by Jew Rothschild..<br />\n<br />\nChitpavan JEW SIR Chintaman Dwarakanath Deshmukh ( won Magsaysay award twice ) who was knighted in 1944 just because he had a Jewess British wife.<br />\n<br />\nSIR Chintaman Dwarakanath Deshmukh attended the Breton Woods Conference to create IMF on invitation of Rothschild in July1944 . ) Rothschild liked him, and he was a member of the Board of Governors of both of IMF for the next ten years..<br />\n<br />\nRBI IS IN THE BUSINESS OF GIVING INDIA A POOR IMAGE ..AS A THIRD WORLD NATION--ON INSTRUCTIONS FROM THE KOSHER DEEP STATE..<br />\n<br />\nRBI\u2019s autonomy is not sanctioned by statute. RBI does not have the powers to work as per its won whims and fancies.. The RBI can only be as autonomous as the government wants it to be.<br />\n<br />\nIn a democracy, the final responsibility of all policy decisions must lie with Government.
