TO HINDUS, INDIAN CULTURE AND THE WATAN.. TERRIFIC INNUENDO..<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE?<br />\n<br />\nTODAY , 4TH OCT 2018, AT 0745 , HE WAS LEADING A DISCUSSION ABOUT AYYAPPA..<br />\n<br />\nTHEN HE SAYS AYYAPPA ( VISHNUs NINTH AVATAR ) IS NASTIKA BRAHMACHARI-- BUT CAN WE EVER CONSIDER KRISHNA ( VISHNUs EIGHT AVATAR ) TO BE A SIMILAR NASTIKA BRAHMACHARI-- WITH A SARCASTIC SMILE , ELUCIDATING A SIMILAR SARCASTIC RESPONESE FROM THE PARTICIPANTS ON STAGE AND THE LEANINGS BASED SELECTED AUDIENCE ..<br />\n<br />\nI MUST TELL THIS TO CULTURAL TERRORIST JOHN BRITTAS..<br />\n<br />\nKRISHNAs MISTRESS RADHA NEVER EXISTED.. WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OF RADHA TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nKALIDAS WHO WROTE ABOUT RADHA NEVER EXISTED.. NOT A SINGE DASA OF THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT EXISTED ..BHAKTI MVOVEMENT NEVER EXISTED.. HINDUS DO SHRADDHA , NOT BHAKTI..<br />\n<br />\nTHE CHRISTIANS AND ATHEISTS AND ZAKIR NAIK MADE A GREAT DEAL OF KRISHNA BEING A WOMANISER.. THAT HE WAS FROLICKING WITH 16000 VIRGIN GOPIKA DAMSELS, WHOM HE DEFLOWERED....<br />\n<br />\nDEVDUTT PATTANAIK HAS BEEN REGULARLY DENIGRATING KRISHNA-- THE LAST I HEARD HIM TELLING ON EPIC TV THAT KRISHNA WAS A CROSS DRESSER AND HE USED TO EXCHANGE CLOTHES WITH RADHA ..<br />\n<br />\nHULLO EX-JNU STUDENT COMMIE JOHN BRITTAS... YOUR MIND IS SO SHALLOW AND FULL OF POISON-- YET, TRY ND UNDERSTAND THIS..WE KNOW YOU DONT HAVE THE BALLS TO INSULT ISLAM..<br />\n<br />\n16000 GOPIKAS ALLUDE TO THE 16000 DHATUS OF SAHASRARA CHAKRA WHICH IS A 1000 PETALLED LOTUS IN FULL BLOOM ..EACH PETAL WITH 16 KALAS ( ASPECTS ) ...<br />\n<br />\nNARAKASURA KIDNAPPED 16000 GOPIKAS WHOM KRISHNA SAVED --THIS IS JUST AN ALLEGORY..<br />\n<br />\nIN SANATANA DHARMA ALL GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES ,, EXCEPT VISHNU AVATARS RAMA, KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY DESH DROHI LITERARY FEST --HAD ATHEIST COMMIES AND WHITE CHRISTIANS SINGING PRAISES OF KRISHNAs MISTRESS RADHA AND HER BOLD SEXUALITY ..<br />\n<br />\nJAYADEVA WHO INVENTED RADHA NEVER EXISTED. HE WAS A FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATION OF JEW ROTHSCHILD.<br />\n<br />\nOdissi dance was created by the white invader to propagate the FAKE Radha. Jayadeva's ashtapadis are sung in dance performances of Odissi. Oriya bhajans are all ragas and talas specified by COOKED UP Jayadeva's hymns.<br />\n<br />\nTHE FAKE MUTTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD SPREAD THE FAKE WORK OF JAYADEVA \"GITA GOVINDA \" PACKED WITH KRISHNA RADHA EROTICA AND SEX ..<br />\n<br />\nAMITABH BACHCHAN PROPAGATES LIES ON TV SHOW KBC-- THAT BUDDHA IS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU, THAT JAYADEVA IS THE COURT POET OF KING LAKSHMANASENA OF BENGAL GETTING ORIYAS HOPPING MAD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HINDU HATING ITALIAN WAITRESS RELEASED STAMPS OF JAYADEVA IN 2009.. OH YEAH ?..<br />\n<br />\nSORRY THIS BRAHMACHARYA CONCEPT PROPAGATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS GANDHI AND VIVEKANNADA DOES NOT BELONG TO SANATANA DHARMA..<br />\n<br />\nThe technical meaning of Brahmacharya is self-restraint, particularly mastery of perfect control over the senses- not the PRICK or DICK or LODA alone...<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is the virtue of celibacy when unmarried and fidelity when married..<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is a means, not an end. It usually includes cleanliness, ahimsa, simple living, studies, meditation, and voluntary restraints on certain foods, intoxicants, and behaviors-(including sexual behavior)...<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD ENCOURAGED HOMOSEXUALS AND IMPOTENT MEN TO BECOME GURUS... Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/the-indian-constitution-does-not-allow.html?showComment=1541402414156#c3218814970497086894\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 5, 2018 at 12:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_10MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMOST IMPORTANT COMMENT:<br />\nMOST IMPORTANT COMMENT:<br />\nMOST IMPORTANT COMMENT:<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/judiciary-in-contempt-of-we-people-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE ATHEIST COMMIE CM OF KERALA PINARAYI VIJAYAN IS HELL BENT OF BREAKING THE SPINE OF SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE..<br />\n<br />\nTHE MOST IMPORTANT ASPECT IS \u201cNEY ABHISHEKHAM\u201d. ( GHEE SACRIFICE )..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS NOT THE MALE HUSBAND OR SON ALONE THAT BENEFITS FROM THE PILGRIMAGE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WIFE FILLS UP A COCONUT WITH DESI GHEE ( USING THE MIDDLE EYE OF THE COCONUT ) IN FRONT OF THE AYYAPPA IDOL OR PICTURE OF HER HOME BESIDE A LIT LAMP..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS GHEE FILLED COCONUT IS CARRIED INSIDE THE IRUMUDI KETTU ON THE HEAD OF THE MALE PILGRIM..<br />\n<br />\nHE WILL NOT ALLOW THE IRUMUDI KETU TO TOUCH THE GROUND TILL HE CLIMBS UP THE 18 STEPS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE KERALA POLICE IS DOING BLASPHEMY BY ORDERING THE PILGRIM TO OPEN THE IDRUMUDI KETTU , AS IF THERE IS A TIME BOMB INSIDE.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS GHEE IS POURED ON THE AYYAPPA IDOL INSIDE THE SANNIDHANAM.. TIMING WINDOW IS FROM 0330 AM TO 7 AM AND THEN 0830 TO 1100 AM..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS GHEE IS GIVEN BACK AS PRASADMA AND THE PILGRIM GOES BACK HOME WITH THIS GHEE FOR HIS WIFE ( OR MOTHER WHO FILLED THE COCONUT ) TO CONSUME ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS EQUIVALENT TO THE MENSTRAUTING WOMAN UNDERTAKING THE PILGRIMAGE HERSELF..<br />\n<br />\nAS THE MALE PILGRIMS WALKS TOWARDS SABARIMALA UNDER A GURUSAMI , THEY CHANT JOYOUSLY \u201c NEY ABHISHEKAM SWAMIKKE \u201c ..<br />\n<br />\nNEY ABHISHKAM HAS PUJA TIMINGS AT DAWN ..<br />\n<br />\nIF THE PILGRIMS IS FORCED BACK BY THE KERALA POLICE ON COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYANs ORDERS , HE CANNOT DO THE NEY ABHISHEKAM.. THE SPINE OF THIS SOLEMN ENDEAVOUR IS BROKEN..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nFor those pilgrims who have not observed the purity ( say he masturbated ) during his trek to Sabarimala , he will not take back the ghee he brought inside the coconut, there is a container called Neythoni (Ghee Canoe) into which they pour out the ghee. He goes back home empty handed sans prasadham..<br />\n<br />\nThe wife understands as the ghee would hurt her..<br />\n<br />\nThis pilgrimage is then not considered to be ACCOMPLISHED.<br />\n<br />\nIf later he has to become a guruswamy, he has to count how many ties he took the ghee prasadam back home to the woman who filled it..<br />\n<br />\nIt has to be 18 times..<br />\n<br />\nThere is no fooling anybody here , including yourself..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS RITUAL HAS GONE ON FOR 5900 YEARS..<br />\n<br />\nNOW WE HAVE AN ATHEIST COMMIE CM NAMED PINARAYI VIJAYAN WHO HAS UNLEASHED A STALIN TYPE REIGN OF TERRROR ..<br />\n<br />\nHE HAS SELF DESTRUCTED..<br />\n<br />\nHE IS BEYOND CARE !<br />\n<br />\nCOMMUNIST PARTY IS DEAD \u2013THE LAST BASTION OF KERALA HAS CRUMBLED, DUE TO ONE MANs GOONDAGIRI..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_10BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; TRAMPLING ON THE WILL OF \"WE THE PEOPLE\" IN A DEMOCRACY \u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe Supreme Court is itself bound by the Constitution of India and the Parliament can amend the Constitution any time they want.. The Melords don\u2019t realize this\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe time has come for the Supreme Court to introspect on whether the use of Article 142 as an independent source of power should be regulated by strict guidelines\u2014if the Melords DRUNK WITH POWER do not then the govt must strike it down with an ordinance..<br />\n<br />\nARTICLE 141 GIVES THE ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY UNBRIDLED DISCRETIONARY POWER WITHOUT ANY ACCOUNTABILITY WHATSOEVER\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIn a landmark ruling on 11 January 2007, the Supreme Court of India ruled that all laws (including those in the Ninth Schedule) would be open to Judicial Review if they violated the basic structure of the constitution. ..<br />\n<br />\nSorry, this ruling is NULL AND VOID.. Supreme court has NO such powers\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE ASK THE MODI GOVT TO BRING AN ORDINANCE TO OVERTUN THE SUPREME COURT VERDICT..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 32: Allows any AGGRIEVED person to knock on the doors of the Supreme Court in case of (what according to him is) a violation of Fundamental Rights\u2026<br />\n<br />\nEmpowers the SC to issue Writs to enforce such person's Fundamental Rights, if such a violation has indeed taken place\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIN THE CASE OF SABARIMALA THE PIL WAS FILED BY A CRYPTO JEW MUSLIM NAMED NAUSHAD KHAN.. HE WAS NOT AN AGGRIEVED PERSON.. KHAN BABY SHOULD HAVE WORRIED ABOUT MUSLIM WOMEN NOT BEING ALLOWED IN SUNNI MOSQUES\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE MODI GOVT TO PASS A LAW CREATING STRICT GUIDELINES FOR JUDICIARY TO ENTERTAIN PILs.. ..<br />\n<br />\nNO JUDGE CAN GO BEYOND THE CONSTITUTION.. ALL JUDGES CAN DO IS TO INTERPRET LAWS.. JUDGES CANNOT STRIKE DOWN OR CREATE ANY LAWS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE CONSTITUTION IS A DYNAMIC DOCUMENT.. CONSTITUTION CANNOT BE USED AS A FRANKENSTEIN TO STRAITJACKET WE THE PEOPLE WHO ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION...<br />\n<br />\nTO MOVE WITH THE TIMES\u2014WHEN THE BABY BECOME BIGGER , LENGTHEN THE CRADLE ( CONSTITUTION ) , DON\u2019T CUT THE LEGS OF THE BABY. WE ARE IN THE MODERN DIGITAL AGE\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE NEED JUDGES TO BE RECRUITED BY AN INTELLIGENT SYSTEM LIKE IIT OR IAS..<br />\n<br />\nWE ARE DONE WITH THE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL BECOMING LAWYERS AND THEN BOTTOM DREGS OF THE LOSER LAWYER POOL BECOMING MELORD JUDGES, WHO ARE SO SQUEAMISH ( OUT OF INFERIORITY COMPLEX ) THAT THEY WILL SEND YOU TO JAIL FOR \"CONTEMPT OF COURT \" AT THE DROP OF A HAT.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/we-people-declare-that-all-laws-created.html<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_82BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; NOTHING... KASHMIRI PANDITS HAVE BEEN IGNORED..<br />\n<br />\nMODI IS CROSSING THE RUBICON LINE..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HINDUS OF INDIA WILL DECIDE THAT MODI IS ANTI--HINDU..<br />\n<br />\nGUJJU NO 1 , MK GANDHI PRETENDED TO BE A HINDU WHILE IN REALITY HE WAS KATHIAWRI JAIN-JEW..<br />\n<br />\nAMIT SHAH IS A JAIN PRETENDING TO BE A HINDU, AS PER HIS CLOSE RELATIVES..ON OF THEM IS IN CALICUT..<br />\n<br />\nGUJJU NO 2 , PM MODI AT THIS RATE WILL LOSE THE LOK SABHA ELECTIONS IN 2019.. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_25.html?showComment=1540518427409#c7188653095894027578\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 26, 2018 at 7:17 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_59MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.foxnews.com/health/popular-breakfast-foods-contain-active-ingredient-found-in-roundup-weed-killer-study-finds<br />\n<br />\nThe introduction of so-called \u201cRoundup Ready\u201d genetically engineered (GE) crops led to a massive increase in the use of Roundup, the active ingredient of which is glyphosate.<br />\n<br />\nNearly all GM crops are designed with genes to resist a potent herbicide called Round Up or glyphosate. This roundup pesticide is very dangerous for human beings..<br />\n<br />\nIN HIS CRIMINAL HASTE TO GET A NOBEL PRIZE , PM MODI HAS PLAYED KOSHER BALL WITH GM COMPANIES ..<br />\n<br />\nRather than testing GMO foods before releasing them for public consumption, Indians became the guinea pigs in a massive GE experiment.<br />\n<br />\nGlyphosate impedes the building of important essential amino acids like phenylalanine, tyrosine, and tryptophan by interrupting the seven step SHIKIMATE PATHWAY pathway in plants..<br />\n<br />\nIF I WERE TO ASK JP NADDA --WHAT IS SHIKIMATE ?-- WE KNOW WHICH ORIFICE HE WILL SCRATCH FIRST..<br />\n<br />\nGlyphosate is a mineral chelator. This means it binds to trace minerals like manganese, iron, cobalt (cobalamin) and molybdenum, and copper and makes them unavailable to the body. Our gut bacteria need minerals to work properly..<br />\n<br />\nFor example, Lactobacillus depends on manganese.<br />\n<br />\nThese bacteria have an unusual mechanism to protect themselves from oxidative damage, which involves manganese. But they can\u2019t get at it because the manganese hides inside the glyphosate molecule.<br />\n<br />\nWe can compare glyphosate to VX (venomous agent X) nerve gas.<br />\n<br />\nBoth glyphosate and VX are organophosphorus synthetic chemicals and both act like weapons of mass destruction when unleashed in the environment. Glyphosate will brown plants within 6 hours and kill them within 12.<br />\n<br />\nGMO plants are built to be resistant to glyphosate but humans are not. Because glyphosate is water soluble, the majority of the herbicide makes it into our drinking water and rain<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/shikimate-pathway-cancer-spurt-in-india.html<br />\n<br />\nAside from a cancer link, Roundup\u2019s effect on gut bacteria also suggests the chemical play a significant role in digestive issues, obesity, autism, Alzheimer\u2019s disease, depression, Parkinson\u2019s disease, liver diseases and many other chronic health problems.<br />\n<br />\nMonsanto filed a motion to have the case dismissed, saying the label is accurate because \u201cthe enzyme targeted is not produced by the human body or found in human cells\u201d<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW WHY DEEP STATE SPONSORED EX-CJI JS KHEHAR ( A USELESS SUPREME COURT JUDGE ) WANTED WHITE JEW LAWYERS IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nNOW THIS PATHETIC FELLOW WHO SUPPORTED TRIPLE TALAQ WILL BE THE NEXT CHAIRMAN OF NHRC... TRYING TO COMPARE THE TWO IS LIKE COMPARING AN ANT TO AN ELEPHANT..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SABARIMALA IS THIS PLANETs LARGEST PILGRIMAGE , TWICE BIGGER THAN KUMBH MELA AND FIVE TIMES THE SIZE OF HAJJ..&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS LONG AS SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE PROVIDES SUCCOR TO THE POOR AND DOWNTRODDEN PEOPLE , NO EVANGELIST CAN CONCERT HINDUS TO ALIEN RELIGIONS..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PILGRIMS GO TO SABARIMALA TO LOSE THEIR VICES AND PHOBIAS . . . DRUNKARDS AND WIFE BEATERS GO TO SABARIMALA AND COME BACK LIKE NEW BORN BABIES ....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TO LOSE A VICE YOU HAVE TO ABSTAIN FOR 21 DAYS --BODY IS LIKE A RIVER -- ALMOST ALL BODY CELLS GET RENEWED ... . SABARIMALA OFFERS DOUBLE THE TIME AS THE VRAT IS 41 DAYS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE MAGIC OF SABARIMALA LIES IN 3 FLASHES , THE PURE AWARENESS BETWEEN THE TEN SECOND PERIOD SECOND AND THIRD FLASHES . . .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LORD AYYAPPA IS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD DELETED AYYAPPA LIKE NIKOLA TESLA AND INSERTED BUDDHA..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS JEW WHO RULED INDIA, WHO IS BIG BROTHER AND RUNS THE DEEP STATE , HAS ADOPTED AYYAPPA AS IMHOTEP AS THE PATRON DEITY OF FREEMASONS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">DISMISS THE ATHEIST COMMIE GOVT OF KERALA..</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 26, 2018 at 8:30 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWE ASK HOME MINISTER RAJNATH SINGH TO SUMMON DGP POLICE OF KERALA BEHERA AND ASK HIM WHY FALSE IPC SECTIONS WERE SLAPPED ON RAHUL EASHWAR...<br />\n<br />\nASK DGP BEHERA WHY RAHUL EASHWAR WAS BUNDLED INTO A TARPAULIN ROLL AND TAKEN WAY IN A TRACTOR--IS THIS PRPER PROCEDURE ..<br />\n<br />\nWARN DGP BEHERA NOT TO COMMIT ATROCITIES OF ADIVASIS AGAIN , WHO WERE PEACEFULLY PROTESTING AGAINST COMMIE ATHEISTS TRAMPING ON THEIR FAITH..<br />\n<br />\nCOMMIE CADRE IN SABARIMALA PILGRIMS GARB WERE THE ONES TO THROW STONES ON THE POLICE ( FALSE FLAG/ HEGELIAN DIALECTIC ) TO GIVE POLICE THE RUSE TO BRUTALLY LATHI CHARGE THE PROTESTORS..<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK RAJNATH SINGH-- SINCE DGP BEHAREA AND IG OF POLICE MANOJ ABRAHAM HAVE PROVES SUCH EFFICIENCY IN DEALING WITH STONE THROWERS --TRANSFER THIS DUO TO KASHMIR WHERE THEY CAN SERVE THE NATION BETTER..<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK AJIT DOVAL TO INQUIRE INTO THE CONSPIRACY ( FOREIGN FRCES ) OR RESTRICTING THE NUMBER OF SABARIMALA PILGRIMS AND PROFILING THEM VIA AN ONLINE PROCESS ..<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE STATE GOVERNOR AND PRESIDENT OF INDIA TO USE THEIR SUBJECTIVE DISCRETIONARY POWERS AND DISMISS THE CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN GOVT HEREWITH..<br />\n<br />\nWE MUST NOT ALLOW A REIGN OF ATHEIST COMMIE TERROR ( LIKE STALIN ) TO INFLICT A PERMANENT SCAR ON THE PSYCHE OF THE PEOPLE OF KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nCJI GOGOI MUST KNOW THAT HINDU WOMEN OF MENSTRUATING AGE DO NOT WANT TO VISIT SABARIMALA BY FREE CHOICE.. THIS IS REAL WOMENs ENPOWERMENT..<br />\n<br />\nDRUNKEN WOMEN WEARING SKIMPY WESTERN CLOTHES , SHOWING PRIVATE PARTS ON STREETS AT MIDNIGHT AND HAVING SEX BEFORE AND AFTER MARRIAGE WITH MULTIPLE PARTNERS IS NOT WOMENs EMPOWERMENT..<br />\n<br />\nKERALA WOMEN HAVE SHOWN THE WAY TO THE REST OF INDIAN WOMEN.. STANDING AND PISSING IN MENS URINAL IS NOT REQUIRED TO BE LIBERATED.<br />\n<br />\nA LIBERATED INDIAN WOMAN IS A STRONG WOMAN HAVING GRACE AND DIGNITY WHO RUNS A HAPPY HOME AND SACRIFICES FOR HER HUSBAND AND CHILDREN....<br />\n<br />\nLET ME END WITH A SPOOF ON THE TRAVAILS OF BEERANKUTTY DUE TO THE SUPREME COURT LAW ON ADULTERY..( NOTE JUDGES CANNOT CREATE OR STRIKE DOWN LAWS--THEY CAN ONLY INTERPRET LAWS MADE BY ELECTED LEGISLATURE )..<br />\n<br />\n#####################<br />\nBEERANKUTTY LOVED HIS WIFE TOO MUCH ..<br />\n<br />\nHE GOT AN UNEXPECTED BONUS AT WORK ..<br />\n<br />\nHE RAN SKIPETTY SKIP AND BOUGHT A GOLD NECKLACE FOR HIS DEAR WIFE..<br />\n<br />\nWANTING TO SURPRISE HER , HE QUIETLY OPENED THE BACKDOOR OF HIS HOME ,TIP TOED AND ENTERED HIS BED ROOM..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT HE SAW MORTIFIED HIM..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS HIS YOUNG WIFE ON THE BED BEING ASSAILED BY THREE OF HIS NEIGHBOURS FROM ALL THREE ORIFICES.<br />\n<br />\nKNEE JERK HE UTTERED \u201c TALAAQ TALAAQ TALAAQ \u201c\u2014 LITERALLY ONE FOR EACH STUFFED HOLE.<br />\n<br />\nHE THEN HAD THE PRESENCE OF MIND TO QUICKLY WHIP OUT HIS MOBILE PHONE AND TAKE COUPLE OF DAMNING PHOTOS..<br />\n<br />\nARMED WITH DAMNING EVIDENCE BEERANKUTTY RAN HOPPETY HOP TO THE POLICE STATION..<br />\n<br />\nALAS \u2013..<br />\n<br />\nHE FOUND HIMSELF IN JAIL ON TWO CRITICAL CHARGES AS PER IPC.<br />\n<br />\nFIRST CHARGE: UTTERING TRIPLE TALAQ..<br />\n<br />\nSECOND CHARGE: INVADING THE PRIVACY OF HIS NEIGHBOURS ( ADULTERY LAW )..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE CONDITION OF OUR WATAN TODAY..<br />\n<br />\n########################<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; HAS SUCH A THING EVER HAPPENED IN INDIA?.. IT WAS THE COMMIE CADRE IN PILGRIM GARB THREW STONES ON POLICE AS A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC..<br />\n<br />\nDDD ) WE ASK THE <b><span style=\"color: red;\">PM OF INDIA AND THE LAW MINISTER PRASAD</span></b> TO MONITOR..<br />\n<br />\nEEE) WE THE PEOPLE ASK <b><span style=\"color: red;\">AJIT DOVAL </span></b>-- THERE ARE FOREIGN DEEP STATE CHRISTIAN FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs WHO WANT TO KILL THE WORLDs LARGEST PILGRIMAGE SABARIMALA ... IS ABUSING HINDU FAITH ALLOWED BY APPLYING THE WORD SECULAR ?..<br />\n<br />\nIII ) WE ASK <b><span style=\"color: red;\">COL RATHORE</span></b> TO FIND OUT WHY ALL TV CHANNELS EXCEPT JANAM TV ARE TELLING FOUL LIES ABOUT SABARIMALA.<br />\n<br />\nWHY ARE HINDUS CALLED FRINGE ELEMENTS IN OUR OWN ANCIENT LAND ?.. NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI-- DO YOU HAVE A SPINE ?.. .. OR DO HINDUS NEED TO VOTE IN STRONG LEADERS LIKE PRAVEEN TOGADIA / YOGI ADITYANATH IN 2019?<br />\n<br />\nTODAY THE WORD \"SECULAR\" HAS BEEN HIJACKED NY VESTED INTERESTS LIKE PRANNOY JAMES ROY - TO MEAN \"ALL RELIGIONS OTHER THAN HINDUISM\" -- THAT HINDUS ARE COMMUNAL -- AND THE MEDIA HAS TOLD THIS ENOUGH TIMES TO BE REGULARIZED..<br />\n<br />\nSECULAR MEANS EQUAL TREATMENT OF ALL RELIGIONS. ( read this line a trillion times ) .. ..<br />\n<br />\nIMAGINE KASHMIRI MUSLIMS HAVE ETHNICALLY CLENASED HINDUS AND ARE STILL CLAIMING TO BE \"MINORITY PROTECTED BY SECULAR LAWS \"..<br />\n<br />\nTHE I&amp;B MINISTERS OF INDIA HAVE PLAYED ALONG WITH BENAMI MEDIA TO SUSTAIN THE LIE OF THE WORD \"SECULAR\" ( INSERTED WITH AN ULTERIOR MOTIVE BY INDIRA GANDHI IN 1976 IN THE PREAMBLE OF THE CONSTITUTION DURING EMERGENCY ) TO WRANGLE CHRISTIAN AND MUSLIM SUPPORT..AS SHE HAS LOST HINDU HEARTLAND SUPPORT..''<br />\n<br />\nTHIS INSERTION OF THE WARPED WORD SECULAR INTO THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION HAS BEEN THE GREATEST FRAUD PERPETRATED ON INDIA SINCE INDEPENDENCE\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/judiciary-in-contempt-of-we-people-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">DISMISS THE WORSE THAN STALIN GOVT OF ATHEIST COMMIE CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN.. YOU DO NOT REPRESENT INDIA OR \"WE THE PEOPLE\".. Materialism is a metaphysical creed, not science\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarx baby lifted from the works of Carl Menger and Murray Rothbard\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarx does not condemn the capitalist. TEE HEEEE !..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AIYOOOO --IPPIDI NANN PAAKKAVAI ILLAI !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN COMMIE GOVT BE WARNED --</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IF THERE IS SERIOUS LAW AND ORDER PROBLEM / CIVIL UNREST WHEN SABARIMALA SANNIDHANAM RE-OPENS , DUE TO THE KERALA STATE GOVT BEING UNABLE TO PROVIDE DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE ) TO PEOPLE , \"WE THE PEOPLE\" WHO ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION , WILL ASK THE STATE GOVERNOR AND PRESIDENT TO INVOKE ARTICLE 356 AND DISMISS THE ATHEIST COMMIE GOVT OF KERALA..</span></b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 356 is inspired by sections 93 of the Government of India Act, 1935, which provided that if a Governor of a state ( VESTED WITH SUBJECTIVE DISCRETIONARY POWERS ) is satisfied that a situation had arisen in which the government of the state cannot be carried on in accordance with the provisions of the said Act, he could assume to himself all or any of the powers of the government and discharge those functions in his discretion.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The imposition of the President's rule requires the sanction of both the houses of Parliament. If approved, it can go on for a period of six months. However, the imposition cannot be extended for more than three years, and needs to be brought before the two houses every six months for approval.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/judiciary-in-contempt-of-we-people-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">CM PINARAYI VIJAYANs FACE BOOKS POSTS ABOUT SABARIMALA WILL GO AGAINST HIM IN A COURT OF LAW.. THIS POLICE ESCORT WAS 200 MEN STRONG..<br />\n<br />\nWELL AYYAPPA IS THE NINTH AVTAR OF VISHNU..<br />\n<br />\nMORE SHOCKING THAN THIS IS THE DESECRATION GOING ON AT KODUNGALLUR TEMPLE ANNUALLY AT THE BHARANI FESTIVAL..<br />\n<br />\nHERE AT KODUNGALLUR THE DIETY IS MORE REVERED --THE WIFE OF SHIVA , DEVI..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THE SANCTUM IS MORE REVERED , THIS SPOT WHERE EVERY ANCIENT GREEK STUDENT ( LIKE PYTHAGORAS , PLATO ETC ) RECEIVED THEIR FINAL PASSING OUT CONVOCATIONS OF \"</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">TAT TWAM ASI</span></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\"..</span></div>\n<br />\nTHE MENSES BLOOD FLUNG ON THE DEVI IDOL AT KODUNGALLUR IS ALSO MIXED WITH SH!T , SEMEN AND THEERTHAM WATER AND FLUNG BY TAMIL DALITS , WHILE SINGING THE XXX SEXUALLY LOADED VULGAR SONG OF \" IF YOU WANT TO FU#K KODUNGALLUR AMMA ( SHIVAs WIFE ) YOU NEED A PRICK AS BIG AS THE TEMPLE KODIMARAM ( FLAG STAFF )...<br />\n<br />\nTHE DESECRATION OF KODUNGALLUR INNER TEMPLE SANCTUM STARTED AFTER THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA.. THEY WANTED TO DELETE THIS HISTORICALLY MOST HALLOWED SPOT ON THE PLANET..<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE WHITE INVADER SUCCEEDED , AS TODAY NOBODY KNOWS THAT THE PLANETs OLDEST UNIVERSITY IS KODUNGALLUR ( NOT TAXILA / NALANDA..) , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY BURNT MIDNIGHT OIL TO OPEN CHAMIYA BARS ( WH0RE HOUSES IN MUMBAI ) BREAD WINNERS OF ENTIRE FAMILIES HAVE BEEN ROTTING IN JAIL WITHOUT A TRIAL FOR THREE DECADES ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONLY THE RICH ARE AFFORDED BAIL..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE MAIN REASONS FOR NAXALISM AND OUR RED CORRIDOR ARE THE CALLOUS JUDGES . .. POOR UNDERTRIALS WHO ARE BREAD WINNERS ARE KEPT IN JAIL FOR DECADES WITHOUT A TRIAL . .. .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">POOR PEOPLE DO NOT HAVE THE WHEREWITHAL TO PROVIDE BAIL MONEY OR PERSONAL SURETY . . .WITH ANOTHER MAN COMING AND SHOWING ALL THOSE DOCUMENTS WHICH ARE REQUIRED FOR THE GUARANTEE . ...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY IS THE INDIAN GOVT INSISTING ON BAIL MONEY FROM VERY POOR PEOPLE ? . .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RETRIED EX-CJI KATJU GOT BUSHWHACKED AND AMBUSHED BY CURRENT CJI-GOGOI ...COLLEGIUM JUDGES ARE NOT GOD.....</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IF KATJU HAS WRITTEN SOMETHING IN HIS BLOG ABOUT MALFUNCTIONING JUDICIARY, WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA APPRECIATE IT.....IF IT IS A FOUL PERSONAL ATTACK ON A JUDGE VIA A BLOG, IT DOES NOT AMOUNT TO CONTEMPT OF COURT... ....</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LET THE JUDGE WHO WAS PERSONALLY ATTACKED ALLOW THE LAW TO TAKE COURSE ( TELLING TRUTH IS NOT DEFAMATION ) -- BUT DEFINITELY NOT VIA CONTEMPT CLAUSE..........&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE INDIANS ARE NOT FOOLS \u2026\u2026\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE HAVE A LAW MINISTER PRASAD WHO DOES NOT KNOW IF HE IS COMING OR GOING.. ALL HE DOES IS TO GIVE HIS BOSS A EGO MASSAGE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTEMPT OF COURT APPLIES WHEN THE COURT IS IN SESSION AND SOMEONE IN THE COURT RELATED TO THE CASE UNDERMINES THE JUDGE'S AUTHORITY REPEATEDLY . \u2026&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTEMPT OF COURT CANNOT BE APPLIED ALONG THE LENGTH AND BREATH OF INDIA ( ON LAND/ UNDER GROUND/ IN SPACE ) , AS IT IS MEANT WITHIN THE CONFINES OF A WEE BRICK AND CEMENT BUILDING COURT ROOM -</span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR FAILED LAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES DO NOT HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO UNDERSTAND THAT SANE/ FAIR JUDGMENTS MUST BE WITHIN THE PERIMETER OF CONTEXT --AND NATURAL JUSTICE MUST BE INHERENT....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE MELORDS CANT EVEN UNDERSTAND THE MEANING OF CIRCUMSTANTIAL EVIDENCE .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THIS INFORMATION IS FROM MY WIFEs CLASSMATE..<br />\n<br />\nIN THE PENTECOST SYSTEM, THEY REFUSE TO TAKE MEDICATION AND INSTEAD SING THE WHOLE NIGHT..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHEN I WAS FOUR YEARS OLD, I WAS TRAUMATIZED BY SUCH LOUD ABNORMAL MELANCHOLY SONGS IN MALAYALAM , WITH THE DEVOUT CLAPPING , SCREAMING AND JUMPING UP AND DOWN , FROM THE HOUSE OF MY NEIGHBOR THEODORE.--<br /><br />THE ONLY TIME IN MY LIFE SUCH A FEELING EVER CAME ON ME..<br /><br />I KEPT THIS FEARFUL FEELING TO MYSELF..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A SICK CHILD-- THE CHILD DIED WITHOUT MEDICINES ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; Our relationship was questioned by my wife and her husband and several times we were beaten by them.<br />\n4. KASHMIRI PANDITS HAVE BEEN IGNORED..<br />\n<br />\nMODI IS CROSSING THE RUBICON LINE..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HINDUS OF INDIA WILL DECIDE THAT MODI IS ANTI--HINDU..<br />\n<br />\nGUJJU NO 1 , MK GANDHI PRETENDED TO BE A HINDU WHILE IN REALITY HE WAS KATHIAWRI JAIN-JEW..<br />\n<br />\nAMIT SHAH IS A JAIN PRETENDING TO BE A HINDU, AS PER HIS CLOSE RELATIVES..ON OF THEM IS IN CALICUT..<br />\n<br />\nGUJJU NO 2 , PM MODI AT THIS RATE WILL LOSE THE LOK SABHA ELECTIONS IN 2019.. HE WILL HAVE TO FLEE INDIA AND TAKE REFUGE IN ISRAEL..<br />\n<br />\nWE HINDUS DONT CARE FOR MODIs VIKAASS ANY MORE..<br />\n<br />\nBE WARNED..<br />\n<br />\nTHE RUBICON LINE CAN CASTRATE...<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\n<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nGOVERNOR OF KERALA<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nAMIT SHAH<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nLAW MINISTER PRASAD<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nCJI GOGOI<br />\nROHINGTON NARIMAN<br />\nINDU MALHOTRA<br />\nCHANDRACHUD<br />\nKHANWILKAR<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES<br />\nCHIEF JUSTICE OF KERALA HIGH COURT<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nJANAM TV<br />\nRAHUL EASHWAR<br />\nPADMA PILLAI<br />\nNHRC<br />\nNCM<br />\nNCW MAIN<br />\nNCW STATES<br />\nSRI SRI RAVISHANKAR<br />\nSADGURU JAGGI VASUEDEV<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nRAMAN SRIVASTAVA<br />\nEX-CJI DIPAK MISRA<br />\nEX-CJI KATJU<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_184TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2489373258724382048\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_183M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_24.html?showComment=1540459159538#c2489373258724382048\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 25, 2018 at 2:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_183MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/income-tax-officials-conducting-searches-on-premises-of-vv-minerals/articleshow/66356963.cms<br /><br />SINCE PAST SEVERAL YEARS I HAVE COMMENTED MORE THAN 50 TIMES IN NEWS PAPERS ON THE \"MOTHER OF ALL SCAMS\" THE THORIUM SCAM IN TAMIL NADU CONDUCTED BY THE MANNARGUDI MAFIA.<br /><br />WHEN MGR WAS BRAIN DEAD HE WAS KEPT AS A PUPPET CM FOR NEARLY A YEAR ( APOLLO ) DURING WHICH TIME THE ENTIRE COASTAL BELT OF TAMIL NADU WAS CONVERTED TO CHRISTIANITY ALONG WITH LTTE NY DESH DROHI FOREIGN FORCES<br /><br />THE MINING OF PRICELESS THORIUM WENT ON AT NIGHT WITH THE ACTIVE CONNIVANCE OF FISHERMEN, LTTE, MANNARGUDI MAFIA ,POLICE, JUDGES , POLITICIANS ETC<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/03/gold-finger-ajit-vadakayil.html<br /><br />THE SETHUSAMUDRAM CANAL PROJECT WAS CONCEIVED AND ABETTED BY DESH DROHIS-- THE MOOT POINT WAS THORIUM<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/scrap-sethusamudram-project-now-capt.html<br /><br />THERE ARE SEVERAL SHELL COMPANIES FLOATED BY MANNARGUDI MAFIA JUST FOR THRORUIM SAND MINING ( PART OF MONAZITE SAND )<br /><br />In 2002, Sasikala Natarajan's nephews, VS Sivakumar and Karthikeyan Kaliaperumal entered into a partnership with S Vaikundarajan, to form the company A World Rock Pvt Ltd.<br /><br />S Vaikundarajan is the owner of V.V. Minerals, a company with almost monopoly in Tamil Nadu's luctartive beach sand mining business--worth lakhs of crores.<br /><br />For example on 6th August 2013, the Tuticorin district collector Ashish Kumar ( after reading my post on Sethusamudram ) conducted raids on V.V. Minerals stating in his report that the company was involved in large-scale illegal mining. Collector Ashish kumar was transferred within 6 hours by the Mannargudi Mafia whose tentacles is all over Tamil Nadu.<br /><br />On August 7, 2013, J. Jayalalithaa, who was chief minister at the time, ordered senior IAS officer and revenue secretary Gagandeep Singh Bedi to probe the allegations.<br /><br />A month later, Bedi submitted his report. In September 2013, Jayalalithaa banned beach sand mining in five districts of the state \u2013 Tuticorin, Tirunelveli, Kanyakumari, Trichy and Madurai \u2013 and ordered Bedi\u2019s team to extend their probe to the other four districts. But mining went on merrily --as converted Tamil Christian fishermen were more loyal to white skinned Christians--than the watan.<br /><br />As the latest figures from the Tuticorin Port authorities show, close to Rs 40,000 crores worth of beach sand minerals have in fact been openly exported between September 2013 and 2016.<br /><br />In his affidavit before the Madras high court in the PIL, though S Vaikundarajan of VV Minerals has stated that all of his factories have been shut since September 2013.<br /><br />These are the same fishermen who protested at the Kudankulam nuclear plant<br /><br />This THORIUM mining scam in Tamil Nadu is a scam with a difference, -as the Rothschild's BENAMI media blanks it out --and the judges / police / babus controlled by Mannargudi mafia is in cahoots.<br /><br />Justice S Karnan, ( who never tires of flaunting his Dalit identity ), illegally passes an interim order permitting the VV Minerals to dispose of the minerals already mined.<br /><br />This is despite Jayalalithaa getting wise and banning it. Thorium inherent Monazite is a radioactive mineral, and only the government-owned Indian Rare Earth Limited is permitted to handle it.<br /><br />All those involved in including Thorium inherent Monazite in the leases given to V V Minerals should have nbeen prosecuted under the Atomic Energy Act--and these drohis should have been thrown into jail.<br /><br />The export of monazite, used to procure nuclear cooperation from foreign states, was banned by Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru as early as 1962.<br /><br />It was illegal to mine Thorium inherent Monazite --the only entity allowed to do so was the government-owned Indian Rare Earths Limited (IERL).<br /><br />MORE THAN THREE MILLIONS TONNES OF MONAZITE HAS BEEN STOLEN FROM TAMIL NADU BEACHES<br /><br />THORIUM DEPOSITS IN TAMIL NADU BEACHES ARE NOW DEPLETED.<br /><br />WHY HAVE NOT HEADS ROLLED ?<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_183BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8510856241348914266\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_181M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_24.html?showComment=1540459215591#c8510856241348914266\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 25, 2018 at 2:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_181MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br /><br />VV Minerals the largest beach sand mining companies in India was founded by S Vaikundarajan just when MGR went to Apollo hospital. The Mannargudi mafia is part of this.<br /><br />Sasikala's nephews, VS Sivakumar and Karthikeyan Kaliaperumal, had reportedly partnered with S Vaikundarajan, to form a company A World Rock Pvt Ltd in 2002.<br /><br />S Vaikundarajan moves barefeet-- he is illiterate. How has he prospered in this technical field?<br /><br /><br />In a 2014 CBI probe involving the disproportionate assets of Tuticorin Port Trust chairman Subbaiah,S Vaikundarajan moved court for anticipatory bail fearing arrest. He got it .<br /><br />Here is a sound bite ( recorded ) spoken by S Vaikuntarajan \" Normally, to approve a file in the ministry it costs around Rs 15 lakh to Rs 20 lakh...When I met this secretary I offered him Rs 25 lakh. But he said no, there are 15 files here so you give me Rs 15 crore. I said Rs 15 crore is not possible. This secretary rejected the files\u201d<br /><br />S Vaikundarajan has openly denied allegations that he is a benami of CM Jayalalithaa. To questions of his shareholdings in Jaya TV and Midas Distilleries, both owned by Sasikala Natarajan , he replied that he owns shares in a lot of companies and these are only some of them.<br /><br />For close to three decades, beach sand miners of Tamil Nadu have evaded accountability and audits-thanks to patronage leveraged by Mannargudi mafia.<br /><br />On November 9, 2016, the Tirunelveli district collector wrote to the Tuticorin Port authorities questioning how they had allowed exports of beach minerals by various companies, despite this being banned in the state.<br /><br />In January 2015, a PIL was filed in the Madras high court by geologist \u2013 and one time Vaikundarajan rival \u2013 Victor Rajamanickam, alleging that illegal beach sand mining had caused a loss of over Rs 1 lakh crores to the exchequer. The petition pled for a Special Investigative Team to probe into the same.<br /><br />The Chennai high court dismissed his PIL the same month ( so what else is new !)<br /><br />In August 2015, the Tamil Nadu government got a rude shock when the counter-affidavit filed by the Department of Atomic Energy, one of the respondents in the PIL, stated categorically that the state government did not have the right to issue licences to private players to mine monazite. \u201cThat is to say that state government cannot grant mining lease to any private players for \u201cmonazite\u201d,\u201d it said<br /><br />But inside court, the legal blame game began only in July 2016. During a hearing, when counsel for VV Mineral Gopal Subramanian was asked about the inclusion of monazite in the mining leases, counsel argued that the state government suo motu added the mineral in the lease without the company asking for it.<br /><br />A World Rock Pvt Ltd had reported zero revenue in the last 15 years and seemed to be part of a web of 12 other companies with the nephews as directors and sharing the same office address in Chennai, which was not functional.<br /><br />A World Rock appears to have no business activity. Its revenue from operations for the past 15 years is zero; it also posted Rs. 7,500 in losses in their last annual return.<br /><br />It is, however, part of a web of 12 SHELL companies, all bearing the same two directors, VK Sasikala's nephews - VS Sivakumar and Karthikeyan Kaliaperumal, and sharing the same address - Old No. 19&amp;20/12, New No. 38/12, Venkatraman Street, T. Nagar, Chennai.<br /><br />This is an ghost apartment in a residential complex- residents said that someone comes once a month to pay rent, to keep the lease alive.<br /><br />THE THORIUM SCAM WAS KICK STARTED BY CONVERTING THE THORIUM RICH COASTAL BELT OF TAMIL NADU TO CHRISTIANITY . ...<br /><br />TODAY WHEN SRI LANKA RELEASES THE LIST OF TAMIL NADU FISHERMEN, IT READS LIKE A BRAZILIAN FOOTBALL TEAM\u2014 SANTOS, RIVALDO, CARLOS ETC WITH A MUNIYANDI THROWN IN FOR GOOD MEASURE\u2026\u2026.<br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_181MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_181BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_181B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_182B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5534008599973338533\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_182M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_20.html?showComment=1540187532418#c9151176452955723787\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 22, 2018 at 11:22 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_168MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWHO IS RULING KERALA TODAY UNDER COMMIE CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN? ...<br />\n<br />\nTHE KANNUR LOBBY.<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE IS FROM KANNUR , MY MOTHER IS FROM KANNUR, MY SONS WERE BORN IN KANNUR..<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW KANNUR FROM ANCIENT DAYS..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFEs FAMILY HAD THE FIRST CAR AND PHONE IN THE WHOLE OF KANNUR DISTRICT--EVEN AHEAD OF THE KANNUR KING...<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFEs GRANDMOTHER ( PATERNAL ) ROHINI VAIDYAR , A WOMAN OF GREAT BEAUTY, WAS AYURVEDIC PHYSICIAN FOR KANNUR KING. .. THE FIRST WOMAN AYURVEDIC PHYSICIAN IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nKANNUR HAD ONLY THIYYAS IN ANCIENT DAYS -- THE DANAVAS WHOSE GLORIOUS CIVILIZATION IS MILLENNIUMS OLDER THAN THE VEDIC CIVILIZATION..<br />\n<br />\nKANNUR IS STILL KNOWN AS THE LAND OF KALARI LORE. BALLADS ARE STILL SUNG..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">WHO IS A GURUSWAMI?.</span><br />\n<br />\nA GURUSWAMI IS A MAN WHO HAS BEEN TO SABARIMALA 18 TIMES AFTER FULL 41 DAYS VRAT..HE IS OBSERVED BY ALL ..<br />\n<br />\nONCE HE IS ADORNED WITH GURUSWAMIs MANTLE HIS VOICE HAS STRENGTH IN SOCIETY..<br />\n<br />\nHE LEADS A GROUP OF SABARIMALA PILGRIMS THROUGH FORESTS , SOMETIMES UP TO 108 PEOPLE --THOSE DAYS A DANGEROUS 65 KM TREK THROUGH TIGER INFESTED NARROW PATHS ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/judiciary-in-contempt-of-we-people-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nDOES IT MAKE SENSE TO IMPOSE SECTION 144, UNLESS THE IDEA IS TO DESTROY THE SYSTEM ? WE WANT MUSLIM COLLECTOR PB NOOH TO BE TRANSFERRED TO KASHMIR..<br />\n<br />\nANYBODY CAN BE A GURUSWAMI-- AND HE CAN BE A DALIT OR THE POOREST MAN IN THE VILLAGE..<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"><br />ONCE HE BECOMES A GURUSWAMI, A BRAHMIN OR A PRINCE WHO WANTS TO BE IN HIS GROUP MUST TOUCH HIS FEET..</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">SABARIMALA IS A GREAT LEVELLER..</span></div>\n<br />\nWE HAVE A CULTURE..<br />\n<br />\nWE ARE PROUD OF IT..<br />\n<br />\nWE WILL NOT ALLOW COMMIES TO DESTROY OUR CULTURE.<br />\n<br />\nIN AUGUST 2018, CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN WAS KING .. SO MUCH OF GOOD WILL FROM PEOPLE AFTER THE KERALA FLOODS..<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD MY WIFE-- IF PINARAYI VIJAYAN DEFIES THE SUPREME COURT ON SABARIMALA MENSTRUATING WOMENs ISSUE, HE WILL BE A LIFETIME EMPEROR OF KERALA - ALMOST LIKE HAVING CONDUCTED THE \"ASHWAMEDHA YAGNAM \" ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/ashwamedha-yagam-bloodless-sacrifice.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBUT HEY--&nbsp;<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: medium;\"><b>VINAASHA KAALE VIPAREETHA BUDHI..</b></span><br />\n<br />\nAYYAPPA MADE SURE COMMIE CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN WILL SELF DESTRUCT..<br />\n<br />\nONCE PINARAYI VIJAYAN IS OUT OF POWER FOREVER FOR GOOD -- ATHEIST SPIRITS CANNOT SAVE HIM FROM HIS PAST ENEMIES.. THE ONES HE ARROGANTLY RODE ROUGH SHOD ON ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BENGALI AND TELUGU COMMIE LOBBY ARE HAPPY THAT THE KANNUR COMMIE LOBBY HAS SELF DESTRUCTED.. Awaken your inner voice . Experience the joy of your own being . Your own conscience is the best interpreter . In a time of universal deceit, telling the truth is a revolutionary act . The naked truth can never be hate speech or defamation. <span style=\"color: red;\">This blogsite does not sacrifice truth on the altar of political correctness . You shall know the truth and the truth shall set you free . .</span> STRENGTH AND HONOR - ALWAYS !.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_16b+seedCf7JD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_16b+seedCf7JD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_26TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_25B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5133119630302577552\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_25M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c187029376253076018\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_33M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/01800884077530857389\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Mohan</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_22.html?showComment=1540221647330#c187029376253076018\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 22, 2018 at 8:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_33MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nManoj Abraham is a Christian fundamentalist, according to his his batch mates at the Police Academy in Hyderabad. The Christian senior officers like K J Joseph, Jacob Punnoose and Sibi Mathew were his god fathers. His only achievement seems to be the brutal attack unleashed by him against the Hindus, especially BJP and RSS workers in Kerala. With the coming back of Lok Nath Behra, a Christian from the state of Orissa, who was on deputation to the CBI, the Christian officers in the state have become more strong.<br />\n<br />\nThe manner in which Manoj Abraham led the police force in November 2005 to brurally assault the innocent students of the MG College is another proof of his hatred for Hindus. The guilty one had already escaped and the police action was on innocent ones. The students were saved only because of the timely intervention of Senkumar, the IG of Police. Greek Plato ( 427BC-347 BC ) also went back from Kerala as a Mathematician ( he was smarter than Pythogoras ) and a philosopher.<br />\n<br />\nHe shared his spoils with his mentor Socrates, and fellow homosexual side kick Aristotle ( 384 BC- 322 BC ) and got himself immortalized as the founder of the Academy in Athens, the first institution of higher learning in the Western world.<br />\n<br />\nSocrates and Plato were hardcore homosexuals<br />\n<br />\nThis gruesome HOMOSEXUAL TRIO of Plato, Socrates and Aristotle laid the foundations of Western philosophy and science with stolen and patented knowledge .<br />\n<br />\nThe history of fourfold negation, the Catuskoti (Sanskrit), is evident in the logico-epistemological tradition of the 7000 year old Upanishads.<br />\n<br />\nP; that is, being.<br />\nnot P; that is, not being.<br />\nP and not P; that is, being and not being.<br />\nnot (P or not P); that is, neither being nor not being.<br />\n<br />\nThe catu\u1e63ko\u1e6di is a \"four-cornered\" system of argumentation that involves the systematic examination and rejection of each of the 4 possibilities of a proposition,<br />\n<br />\nAll things (dharmas) exist: affirmation of being, negation of nonbeing<br />\nAll things (dharmas) do not exist: affirmation of nonbeing, negation of being<br />\nAll things (dharmas) both exist and do not exist: both affirmation and negation<br />\nAll things (dharmas) neither exist nor do not exist: neither affirmation nor negation<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS A BIG DIFFERENCE BETWEEN INVENTIONS AND INNOVATION.<br />\n<br />\nNIKOLA TESLA WAS AN INVENTOR<br />\n<br />\nSTEVE JOBS WAS AN INNOVATOR WHO HAD AN ARMY OF BRAINS WORKING UNDER HIM.<br />\n<br />\nMary Everest Boole , the wife of George Boole had written that her husband used the Vedic sutras and the laws of Panini.<br />\n<br />\nSame way Dimitri Mendeleyeev had admitted in writing that his PERIODIC TABLE is lifted from the Sanskrit alphabets of Panini.<br />\n<br />\nGeorge Boole and Augustus De Morgan make their pioneering applications of algebraic ideas to the formulation of logic (such as <span style=\"color: blue;\">Algebraic logic and Boolean logic)</span>, from the Vedic sutras written down 7000 years ago.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_57BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJuly 23, 2015 at 9:48 PM<br />\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\nBy combining Boolean logic with ancient Vedic mathematics, substantial amount of iteration were eliminated that resulted in 45% reduction in delay and 30% reduction in power compared with the mostly used (Digit Recurrence, Convergence &amp; Series Expansion) architectures<br />\n<br />\nSulba Sutra dictates the rules spelled out in this text require the construction of various shapes of the Vedic fire altars that will occupy the same space. The earlier Vedic Fire altars required five layers of bricks and each layer consisting 200 burnt bricks, and each layers will be in the perfect harmony of each other.<br />\n<br />\nThis may look to be a simple math problem but without using Trigonometry it is hard to construct the rule based fire altars .<br />\n<br />\nSulba Sutra clearly defines the numerology associated with altar by giving examples of simple Pythagorean triples, such as: (3, 4, 5), (5, 12, 13), (8, 15, 17), (7, 24, 25),and (12, 35, 37), as well verbalization of the Pythagorean theorem for the sides of a square without expressing into a mathematical formula. \"The rope which is stretched across the diagonal of a square produces an area double the size of the original square\u201d<br />\n<br />\nPanini\u2019s grammar includes early use of Boolean logic, of the null operator, and of context free grammars, and includes a precursor of the \u201cBackus\u2013Naur\u201d form (used in the description programming languages) .<br />\n<br />\nPanini lived 7500 years ago. The white invader kicked him forward in time as the Big Bang of the bible was only in 4004 BC.<br />\n<br />\nBoolean Algebra served the basis of early transistors and capacitors used in early primitive form of the computer.<br />\n<br />\nRoger Pot Droit-1949 French writer and Philosopher: \"The Greeks Loved So Much Indian Philosophy that Demetrio Galliano had even translated the Bhagavad-Gita. There is not a shadow of the doubt that the Greeks knew all about Indian Philosophy.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nNow let me digress from COW and DHARMA \u2013 to convince the skeptic western mind \u2014NOT that I care. They can all FUCK themselves for all i care.<br />\n<br />\nThere are <span style=\"color: red;\">seven basic logic gates</span>: AND, OR, XOR, NOT, NAND, NOR, and XNOR.<br />\n<br />\nThe AND gate is so named because, if 0 is called \"false\" and 1 is called \"true,\" the gate acts in the same way as the logical \"and\" operator The output is \"true\" when both inputs are \"true.\" Otherwise, the output is \"false.\"<br />\n<br />\nThe OR gate gets its name from the fact that it behaves after the fashion of the logical inclusive \"or.\" The output is \"true\" if either or both of the inputs are \"true.\" If both inputs are \"false,\" then the output is \"false.\"<br />\n<br />\nThe XOR ( exclusive-OR ) gate acts in the same way as the logical \"either/or.\" The output is \"true\" if either, but not both, of the inputs are \"true.\" The output is \"false\" if both inputs are \"false\" or if both inputs are \"true.\" Another way of looking at this circuit is to observe that the output is 1 if the inputs are different, but 0 if the inputs are the same.<br />\n<br />\nA logical inverter , sometimes called a NOT gate to differentiate it from other types of electronic inverter devices, has only one input. It reverses the logic state.<br />\n<br />\nThe NAND gate operates as an AND gate followed by a NOT gate. It acts in the manner of the logical operation \"and\" followed by negation. The output is \"false\" if both inputs are \"true.\" Otherwise, the output is \"true.\"<br />\n<br />\nThe NOR gate is a combination OR gate followed by an inverter. Its output is \"true\" if both inputs are \"false.\" Otherwise, the output is \"false.\"<br />\n<br />\nThe XNOR (exclusive-NOR) gate is a combination XOR gate followed by an inverter. Its output is \"true\" if the inputs are the same, and\"false\" if the inputs are different.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_55MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_55BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_55B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_56B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7951719901370462886\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_56M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJuly 23, 2015 at 9:49 PM<br />\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nUsing combinations of logic gates, complex operations can be performed. In theory, there is no limit to the number of gates that can be arrayed together in a single device. But in practice, there is a limit to the number of gates that can be packed into a given physical space. Arrays of logic gates are found in digital integrated circuits (ICs).<br />\n<br />\nAs IC technology advances, the required physical volume for each individual logic gate decreases and digital devices of the same or smaller size become capable of performing ever-more-complicated operations at ever-increasing speeds. <span style=\"color: blue;\">Urdhava Tiryakbhyam </span>is a Sanskrit word which means vertically defined as urdhavya and crosswise as triyakbhayam in English.<br />\n<br />\nThe method is a general multiplication formula applicable to all cases of multiplication examples. It is based on a novel &amp; rudimentary concept through which all kind of partial products are generated concurrently.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lVZlMBP658A</span><br />\nPythagoras came to India as a student; but when he left he left as a great teacher. As per Greek history Pythagoras spent 22 years away from home mastering Vedic mathematics, Indian astronomy, Indian music, Hindu mysticism, Yoga, various religious doctrines and philosophy of Yoga<br />\n<br />\nFollowing is a quote from Greek texts-<br />\nQUOTE: Pythagoras became a sworn vegetarian and practiced fasting and Yoga (Standing on one leg).. After his return back, Pythagoras confided to a friend\u201cI am a different man, I am reborn. Through this purification, my center of being has changed. Now truth is not a concept to me, but a life.\" He was 56 years old when he returned home, his home, schools and temples were in ruins due to past Persian invasions. He did not feel welcomed by his friends and neighbors, so he went to southern Italy settling down in city called Crotona and impressed the people over there with his wisdom, so they decided to build an institute which would serve as a school of science, Vedic philosophy and astronomy. There was nothing about the place suggesting any secrecy , since he make sure that the statue of Hermes Trismegistus stood at the inside of the entrance to the school with the words on the pedestal: \"Let no profane enter here.\" He also taught the philosophy, yoga, asceticism, breathing exercise and knowledge of healing through roots and herbs that he had learned from Indians. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nThe tetralemma is lifted from ancient Indian math.<br />\nIt states that with reference to any a logical proposition X, there are four possibilities:<br />\n<br />\nX (affirmation)<br />\n\\neg X (negation)<br />\nX \\land \\neg X (both) equiv.<br />\n\\neg (X \\lor \\neg X) (neither)<br />\n<br />\nShashi Tharoor talked about weavers and looms at Oxford.<br />\n<br />\nI would have preferred that he was a bit more cerebral than \u201cmundanely melodramatic\u201d.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_57b+seedNwzD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_57b+seedNwzD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_78TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_77B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6723404019837613837\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_77M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. If approved, it can go on for a period of six months. However, the imposition cannot be extended for more than three years, and needs to be brought before the two houses every six months for approval.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/judiciary-in-contempt-of-we-people-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">CM PINARAYI VIJAYANs FACE BOOKS POSTS ABOUT SABARIMALA WILL GO AGAINST HIM IN A COURT OF LAW.. WHERE THE CM HIMSELF IS DRIVING MINDLESS CASTE FISSURES.</span>. <b><span style=\"color: red;\">BEEEEG MISTAKE !!!!</span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KERALA WILL NOT BE RULED BY THE ATHEIST COMMUNIST PARTY GEN SECRETARY ..
